Thank You Amazon....in the past couple years since I have had one Kindle or another , I am now reading 100x more than I have in about 30 years and I feel back in love with the written word.
Reviews.Title: I'm on Fire with Kindle Fire

Reviews.Author: Cathi Falconwing
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire is so easy to use. Open the box and you are set to go. The sound, the color, the clarity is phenominal. It's easy to set up, get your KF loaded and you are set to go. As I had the 1st generation KF, everything I had on there, downloaded smoothly and glitch free. Right away, whether it was watching movies, playing games, or reading a book, the extra room and High Definition made everything so much easier to see and/or do.I was annoyed it didn't come with a charger, you have to buy a charger and make sure it's the speedier charging  version, because you dont want to wait any longer than you have to, to get back to your fun.The price  compared to the Ipad makes it a worthy contender. I think I may have had I had an easier time of ease, because of my familiarity with the fist Kindle Fire. Even then, it's no biggie. If a family member can't help you, Ammy's Customer Service will rock your world and explain everything in layman terms to get you started.I really, really wish the had a way to get your books into collections in the KF. A rather inexusable ommision on their part, as they know how badly it's wanted.That's the only flaw in a near perfect ointment. I love my KF and prefer it over the iPad. Now, if the KF could only make and serve coffee.....;-)
Reviews.Title: Once you pick this Kindle Fire up, you won't put it down.

Reviews.Author: anthony v guidotti sr
Reviews.Content: I got this for my wife for Christmas and she can not put it down.  She really loves it and it was at a good price.
Reviews.Title: The best!

Reviews.Author: Arlene J. Obertance "skier"
Reviews.Content: Debated on a Kindle Fire and decided which one to purchase. Purchased a Kindle HD 8.9" and absolutely love it.  Easy to use, easy to maneuver around, easy to download apps.  Love the crisp clear screen.  All my book purchases downloaded automatically.  I had a regular Kindle and had always loved it.  Sound a bit too loud that I've had to turn volume down. My only complaint is when I hold it in portrait view, it tends to hurt my thumbs...arthritis.  But I give my Kindle Fire five thumbs up!March 25- update still love my Kindle Fire. Easy to navigate, easy to go between programs/items.  Battery life could be a bit longer but usable.  For the price, you could do no better.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire wow!

Reviews.Author: Eduardo Lamberti
Reviews.Content: it is great  and  very  easy  to  handel ,also  the sound  is  magnificent  and  the  colors very bright ,the speed  of  the  wifi  is  incredibe  no  down  time  at  all
Reviews.Title: outstanding

Reviews.Author: C. Whelan "MyFire062"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my Kindle Fire HD!!!  For people like me who read incessantly this is a must have. I used to be in a book club where I got discounted prices on my books, my last order with them was 6 books for $35. I thought that was a great deal....Then I got my Kindle and bought a complete 4 books series for $3.96. Major difference. I still have a lot more to learn about it but I do also love the kindle free time feature and parental controls, my little ones can play games or read books without me being concerned about anything.
Reviews.Title: Great investment

Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: I purchased my Kindle HD & couldn't be happier! I am so glad I saved the money in my pocket& purchased a Kindle rather than an ipad..the Kindle does all the same things..I made my purchasebefore a trip & am loving how easy it is finding a WiFi service to connect!!Sorry I didn't purchase my Kindle sooner!!
Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle

Reviews.Author: FroyoShark
Reviews.Content: I've played with a few tablets before, including a Motorola Xoom, iPad 2, and the original Kindle Fire. This blows all of them out of the water in my opinion. Excellent piece of hardware, and at an amazing price. It's missing some features, but you get what you pay for. Amazon's OS is pretty bad, but that can be fixed by rooting.Pros:-Great screen-Good performance-Great batter life-InexpensiveCons:-Lacking features such as a rear facing camera and expandable storage-OS is pretty bad
Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the price

Reviews.Author: Skeptic
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet.  I'm very pleased with it in every way.  I chose this because I'm an extensive Amazon user and this is tied in well.  Other tablets I've tried are equally fine but are tied into other support systems (like the big app choice on Apple), which would be preferred by different people.  Whichever way you go, if you can afford it, definitely buy a high end model.  Add more memory if you carry a lot of media, especially videos.
Reviews.Title: Excellent product, worth the cost

Reviews.Author: Desiree Knott
Reviews.Content: Great resolution. Intuitive. I love it. my granddaughter uses the Fee Time app. It lets her safely explore with age appropriate content.I live the way the email client looks and its ease of use.
Reviews.Title: I bought this mainly fir the free time app for my granddaughter.

Reviews.Author: marsha wallace
Reviews.Content: this is my second Kindle ( still use my touch extensively) but I love that I can use this instead of a computer..it is easy to use, once you read some instructions and it works great with my Wi-Fi..
Reviews.Title: LOVE IT

Reviews.Author: Kelsey Marquez
Reviews.Content: I wanted a bigger tablet and since I couldn't afford the $500 Samsung Note, I decided to go with this Kindle.  It really helps with books because since I needed 12 books this years I wanted to get something that would let me get books cheaper. It works wonderfully for almost all I want to do!d
Reviews.Title: GREAT!

Reviews.Author: Mary V. King "happy listener"
Reviews.Content: My daughter researched the Nook and the Kindle, sadly, (maybe not) she picked the Nook. But after having it, she realized that she saw that the Kindle would suit her needs more....During this time, they came out with the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 and she was sold on that and had to have it.... SO..... Now I want one and mine is on its way.  I am counting on it to have my lectures on audio for school.  It will be so much easier to plug into it and listen to my hearts content and location doesn't really matter!
Reviews.Title: WE have one and are getting another

Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: The audio option added so much more to the book which allows both reading and audio reader by author expect to use audio all the time.
Reviews.Title: Great eye saver for reading

Reviews.Author: Nedra Ann Schott
Reviews.Content: People told me I would love it but I doubted that since I don't read a lot.  However, I've used it every day to watch past TV shows or shop or check email......Sure am glad I let my friends influence me.And - for those of us who aren't as techno-savy as some of the younger generation the customer service help desk is very helpful and polite.
Reviews.Title: Use it every day.

Reviews.Author: alva
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle product I have purchased.  We are a family of Kindlers!  I wouldn't buy anything else.  You cannot beat the product or the price.
Reviews.Title: My 3rd Kindle

Reviews.Author: frederick
Reviews.Content: So far I am digging this product. Unfortunately I bought it for my wife so I don't get to play with it much, but I still love it!
Reviews.Title: Loving It

Reviews.Author: Try Out "Go-to girl"
Reviews.Content: This delivery system provides great video streaming, easy reading experience with X-ray, which I love. I can't see a downside.
Reviews.Title: Great video, easy reading

Reviews.Author: Susan T. Kemp
Reviews.Content: I had a small kindle fire, and just decided to go with the large one...it is a great piece of work!  Excellent for streaming with the larger screen...excellent sound, graphics, and as usual, it syncs right up with my Amazon Prime account...no muss, no fuss.  Why pay $200 more for other tablets?  I bought two of them, and my boyfriend loves to play games on his...it's a win, win...
Reviews.Title: Loving my new Kindle Fire HD 8.9"!

Reviews.Author: Saundra McGinnis
Reviews.Content: Bought for husband, he loves it.  He is not really a techie, but took to it well and learning fast.  Fits his large hands well.  Uses daily, for reading news, watching Netflix, playing games, etc.  Not a cheap toy, wanted to protect it and make it last, so purchased Marware Vibe Standing Case for it too to protect it, fit well.
Reviews.Title: Gift

Reviews.Author: Tomw
Reviews.Content: I chose the Kindle Fire at recommendation of a friend.Only problem I had was trying to download a book while at a motel, but that may have been my fault as I am new to the Kindle. At home I downloaded a book to laptop then transferred to the Kindle. Have not tried doing this with desktop that I am running Linux Ubuntu on.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire

Reviews.Author: L. Coolsen "masonsapron"
Reviews.Content: As good as the IPad for my needs although a little smaller.  It's a bit heavy to hold and the accessories are too expensive. The battery life is only a few hours.  The shipping/ease of order at Amazon is always so good  But i wouldn't be without the Kindle Fire HD now.  Great deal.
Reviews.Title: Fantastic product and well priced.

Reviews.Author: angelicsight
Reviews.Content: I bought this for school and to update my kindle keyboard.  I love the sound, picture, and the ease of searching the web and checking in on facebook.  I would recommend this over every tablet out there.
Reviews.Title: Best Fire Ever!

Reviews.Author: Naushad
Reviews.Content: It just works really, really well. My main reason for getting a new device would be e-books and videos. For media consumption, the Kindle Fire HD just rocks. With Prime, you get 1 book a month free to "borrow." I can also download e-books from my local library.
Reviews.Title: Love Fire HD

Reviews.Author: Bayou Reader
Reviews.Content: I bought my wife a 7" Kindle Fire HD for her birthday. After playing with the unit, I found myself impressed with the image quality, Dolby sound, peppy performance and great touch screen responsiveness. You guessed it, I had to buy one! The 8.9" unit is just as great as the 7" version, only Bigger! Same excellent quality, peppy performance and touch screen responsiveness!I am extremely pleased with both of our Kindle Fire HD's!
Reviews.Title: Excellent Image, great sound quality, peppy performance and responsive touch screen!

Reviews.Author: Cynthia
Reviews.Content: OMG!! do i love this, if your like me and cant figure anything out, well the easy instructions on the amazon web page will help walk you through everything, im up and moveing quickly thanks to that.Love this so muchhhhh
Reviews.Title: New Toy

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I just received this three days ago, so I'm giving an early review.  I have been wanting a tablet, namely an Ipad for a long time now but just could never justify or get a good feeling about the cost, I have the money, just could never get a warm fuzzy feeling about spending the amount that Apple requires to carry their products around.After quite a few hours of research, I settled on the Kindle Fire HD 8.9.  When it arrived, it was almost alll the way charged, configuration with my wireless and Amazon account was extremely easy and I was quickly on my way to "playing" on it.I've read a lot of reviews that talk about the lack of apps, but all the heavy  hitters are there.  Facebook, Netflix, Pinterest, more than enough weather apps, Allrecipies, MyFitnessPal, all the latest games...........other than my personal bank or local television station, I can't really think of anything else that I would like that I'm missing.I'm not a gadget guru, but I have used a couple others and while it affects nothing of my  Kindle experience, I do see where the Kindle does not scroll as beautifully as the Ipad, page turning in the books is not as cool as Nook's actual page turning when I touch the screen, but again, these are very small insignificant things.I spent the better part of the weekend learning my new gadget and I'm in love with it.  The Silk browser is fast,  I can bookmark my webpages that I like to frequent for easier access.  I read the better part of a book and really enjoyed the Sephia option of page color, white seemed a little bright.  I watched a couple episodes of a TV show on NetFlix, my husband watched an AmazonPrime movie and we both surfed the net and played games on it all weekend.  Everything I needed in a tablet is there and the fact that it's half the price of what I've been wanting makes me feel even better about my purchase!!I would certainly recommend this to anyone not wanting to spend a lot when it's only going to be used for entertainment.
Reviews.Title: Beat My Expectations

Reviews.Author: csnyder
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my Kindle Fire.  I also have the regular Kindle and I just love them both.  My only request is a longer battery.
Reviews.Title: It must be love

Reviews.Author: Kelly Flanagan
Reviews.Content: Love it....like being able to hook up to TV monitor and computer to watch Netflix.  Moved up from reg Kindle Fire and am really happy with the upgrades and the expanded apps available for the unit.
Reviews.Title: Great!

Reviews.Author: Lyman D. Elliott
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th book reader.  My first was a small tablet like machine calleda pocket PC with a 4 inch screen and used Mobipocket reader.  My 2nd was the 5 inch Sony reader but with my failing eyesight wanted something with a larger screen.  3rd reader was the Kindle DX that I bought used a couple of years ago.  Worked very well but needed a light attached if I wanted to read in bed before going to sleep.  This is great for reading in dim light or in bed since it has built-in light.  It is only about an inch smaller then the screen on the DX and is considerably lighter.  There is only one thing that would improve this and that would be a SD card or Micro SD card slot.
Reviews.Title: Great prduct

Reviews.Author: Karla S. Duncan
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD 8.9 can do everything I want to use it for - reading to watching videos.  It is easy to navigate and has a great picture.
Reviews.Title: I Love It

Reviews.Author: Thure
Reviews.Content: I'm in love and my laptop is jealous.  I watch a lot of movies and read a little, too.  This is such a handy device that I can't imagine not having one now...and I've only had it less than a month.  Now, I wish I had ordered the 32 GB model.
Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Author: @Lourack1
Reviews.Content: Would have given it 5 stars if it had come with a user manual instead of just startup insturctions. An old dinosaur like me needs me needs a little help learning how to navigate the brave new world of high tec. And the 'trending now' and 'suggested sites', there mere presence on the screen irrataes me. Ay my age I couldn't care less about most of them, and wish I knew how to just delete them. and, of couse, keep them from being replaced by even more unenteresting sites. I like it though! the Kindle is my first attempt at moveing into the high tec world. I have learned a great deal, but I wish it had come with the manual mentioned above.
Reviews.Title: kindle fire

Reviews.Author: Violetta Cisotto
Reviews.Content: This is the BEST!!!!We did not have to buy an iPad as this does everything he needs..THe HD is fabulous and he really enjoys using this better than the NOOK...
Reviews.Title: Christmas gift for my husband

Reviews.Author: hol
Reviews.Content: I purchased my kindle fire for travel. I am glad I Spent the money.  When I asked for support they were prompt and helpful. Thank you
Reviews.Title: kindlefire

Reviews.Author: Leslie G
Reviews.Content: I am loving my Kindle Fire - I got the larger size so I can use it as a tablet.  I still use my Kindle keyboard to read books, partly due to its more comfortable size & partly because the Fire doesn't allow books to be put into collections.  If you are primarily looking for an ereader, I would recommend the tradional Kindle but if you want a device that can do email, surf the web, allow you to watch videos, the Fire is excellent!
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"

Reviews.Author: Jorge Duprey
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my wife and she has not put it down since I gave it to her.
Reviews.Title: Awesome!!

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Recieved it quicker than anticipated.  Easy boot up, easy set up and being as it for my 68 year old mother, I think she will not have any problems.  She loves play slots on my iPad, and she and my daughter fight over it, so this was a good buy for her.
Reviews.Title: Excellent product

Reviews.Author: Christina Oxford
Reviews.Content: Our family loves it!!! It does everything a tablet should! I'm so happy we went with the larger screen. It is well worth it & I've had lots of friends wish they'd gone with the bigger screen after seeing ours:)
Reviews.Title: Amazing!!!

Reviews.Author: frances kurtz
Reviews.Content: i love my kindle a lot  i have an older model but this new one is lovely  the only thing i don't like is the robot voice used to read the audiobooks  my old one is the same  if you see the words kindle edition on the book description it means that you get the robot voice.
Reviews.Title: kindle fire

Reviews.Author: Josephine Brown
Reviews.Content: I truly love my Kindle Fire.  I enjoy reading all my books on it and surfing the web.  The only thing I havn't done yet is watch a video.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire

Reviews.Author: M. Love
Reviews.Content: This Kindle seems well made and loaded with apps.  The Kindle arrived with no manual, so I had to find information on the Kindle in order to be able to navigate the apps.  I have found it quite difficult to locate the free books to read section.  I do love the large size of the screen.  Reading is most enjoyable on the Kindle, and the books load quickly.  I have not used many other apps, so can not rate those as of yet.
Reviews.Title: Kindle HD 8.9

Reviews.Author: Moomers
Reviews.Content: My son loves this product. He is constantly talking about it.  He chose this over the IPad because it did so much more. I would highly recommend it.
Reviews.Title: Great Kindle

Reviews.Author: LUV2READ
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd kindle...need I say more! I love the features, price, free apps, no monthly/hidden charges...just everything this has to offer. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a tablet.
Reviews.Title: my 3rd kindle!!!

Reviews.Author: nickandyhead "Nick"
Reviews.Content: Glad I bought it!!! So excellent for school. Imagine being able to search your college textbooks for important criteria; I no longer have to carry my heavy textbooks around; the textbooks I buy for college are saved for a lifetime; you can easily visit hyperlinks to study related factual Web site data from your textbook now!!! These are so worth it.If you are a regular tablet user... I still recommend this because it is a nicely priced tablet and it does EVERYTHING. Even though it's advertised as not supporting flash, you can download and manually install flash. This thing has it all.
Reviews.Title: AWESOME. THE BEST

Reviews.Author: Brad Rote "BRAD ROTE ~ NOVELIST ~ SCREENWRITER"
Reviews.Content: This Kindle works like a dream. Don't leave home without it. It is so much easier to read books this way.
Reviews.Title: BOOK READER

Reviews.Author: Shirley Sabatino "Deadline! addict"
Reviews.Content: I kept hinting to hubby I wanted this to upgrade my Kindle Touch so he ordered it for me for Valentine's Day!  Love the picture quality!
Reviews.Title: My new Kindle Fire HD

Reviews.Author: Joi Veer "Joi Veer"
Reviews.Content: I dig it...everything Kindle said it would be and more!Can't wait to see what they have in store for the next version.
Reviews.Title: I Dig It!

Reviews.Author: Jill
Reviews.Content: Love this! It's even better than I had thought it would be. Love the size and the quality. It is perfect for traveling, not bulky or heavy. Picks up wi-fi perfectly no matter where I go, and connects great to my phone when I use the mobile hotspot. The delivery was the best part. I was so anxious to get this and it ended up arriving a day early and on my birthday!!!!  Amazon is the best! This Kindle is the best and it is worth it being a prime member!!!
Reviews.Title: LOVE IT- BEST BIRTHDAY GIFT EVER!!!

Reviews.Author: Sonia Perocier
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a tablet that would be great for reading, nothing came close to the Kinle fire, you see my husband read a lot, so I figuered get him a tablet since times have changed from picking up a good book, he absolutely loves it, not just for reading, he plays games, goes on the web, netflix, and most importantly checks out his FB...I would recommend this product...it has so much more...the clarity, the colors is amazing...I would give this product my thumbs up and more If I could.....am glad I made someone very special very satisfied...
Reviews.Title: The purchase was a gift for my husband

Reviews.Author: Rachy
Reviews.Content: cant talk enough about my kindle,  I wish the battery lasted longer, and gave you a warning before it goes dead
Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Author: Julia I
Reviews.Content: This will be hard to believe but I don't even have a cell phone so learning to work the Fire is an experience.  I'm a little aggravated that it didn't have a manual with it for people who have no technical ability.  I love the color and speed of the Fire and have downloaded a few freebies so far.  It will take me awhile to learn but the forums, questions and answers, and other help on the internet and Amazon have helped me immensely.  I may purchase a manual if I find the right one.  I probably won't ever use the Fire to it's capability but, I'm enjoying it so far.Being a senior, I like the size of the screen. And,  the brightness and clarity of the pictures is amazing!  The battery seems to hold a long time as is advertised.  I purchased it mainly for using on long trips since I can download so many movies and games.  I do wish it had a front facing camera.Not ever having anything like this before I can't recommend it on it's technical ability but, I can recommend it on the looks, the number of apps to download, books and movies to download, and there are so many things you can do with this thing.  Having it less than a week, I love it but, sure didn't the first couple of days.  It will be a learning experience.
Reviews.Title: Wow!

Reviews.Author: Claxon,Bill
Reviews.Content: While the browsing experience is notably inferior (silk) and the ergonomics poorly engineered(on off switch,hdmi and charging port)it is the equal for all it does well to the ipad .The screen while not as pixelated, is sharp and better contrasted than my ipad 3 and the image transfered brilliantly to the tv screen via a Cable Matters hdmi cord.The movie choices are fabulous(amazon prime) and free(try that with itunes)But what I wanted to tell you and this you're really going to like, is the SOUND.The dolby stereo excels on its own and when applied via hdmi cable to  the TV , prevails over ipad by a discernible margin.Now lets get this straight the kindle fire hd 8.9  is not an ipad.But it is a superior reader with a better contrasted screen  and sound resonance than the ipad and if you are an amazon prime member, Bezos is making you an offer here you can't refuse.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD  8.9  Matters.

Reviews.Author: CHK
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle Fire, just wish I would have purchased it sooner. Wanted it primarily for an e-reader with some additional options.E-reader is exceptional, have had no problems. Battery life isn't too bad,can go down quickly but reading it lasts at least 10+ hours without plugging it in if it is fully charged.Browsing on the web is decent as well, but haven't ventured into that too much.If  you are wanting a more inexpensive tablet/e-reader, but do not want to buy an iPad, I would say go for it!!The camera is not the greatest, but really have no need for it as I do not Skype and you do have to download the app to use it otherwise, pretty much good for self-portraits.Otherwise, so far after a little over a month, have had no problems with it!
Reviews.Title: Very nice!!

Reviews.Author: Kj
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased a Kindle Fire 8.9 and love it! I bought a case with a blue tooth keyboard in it and it almost functions as a laptop. My daughter loved it so much I went out the next day purchased her the Kindle Fire HD 7in. They are both great. The only complaint I have is that some apps that I normally get for free from Google play either cost money or they aren't available at all. I am still extremely happy with my kindle fire.
Reviews.Title: My favorite electronic gadget!

Reviews.Author: Lauren hudson
Reviews.Content: I got this for Christmas.... because my twin sister wanted the fire. I Didn't even want one. i thought that this invention was going to ruin book stores forever, but when I saw it... this is better than an iPad!!!why?It is the size of an iPad mini with better picture.It can buy everything you can on an iPad, PLUS books. (And movies)It is 400$ cheaper!! :)And it has cool cases. Just saying!!Helpful tips:If you drop this item, it will get really messed up.your text will be all funky. But then I dropped it again, and now it's fine!You can not change the screen savor, so do not try.This item does not have every App that apple products do, but almost.I really hope you found this helpful,- # laurenhreveiws
Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!!!!!

Reviews.Author: William Chai
Reviews.Content: I just bought my Kindle Fire HD 8.9" couple days ago. I fell in love with the crystal clear screen and how much fun it is. But I did have problem with the micro USB charging port, it didn't charge properly and it stopped charging with very little movement. I called amazon's CS and it took me a minute to be connected with a representative. They rushed me a brand new KF via two days shipping. 5 stars for customer service!
Reviews.Title: Great gadget, most of all, GREAT customer service!

Reviews.Author: melissa vanderbloomen
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband for xmas. We love it and the quality is top notch. so clear and QUICK. Only major complaint i have is that we HATE the camera setup. But thats all. We all fight over it in are family :)
Reviews.Title: superior

Reviews.Author: Deborah M. Haber
Reviews.Content: I am thrilled with my Kindle Fire HD.  It is meeting all my needs and amusements.  Thank you for this marvelous advancement.
Reviews.Title: Satisfied at last

Reviews.Author: La' Bookchic
Reviews.Content: I just LOVE my new gadget!!  I thought my Kindle Touch 3G was the bomb until I got this new toy!  Love having all the options that it offers, whether I want to watch a movie, play a game, read a book or just surf the web & look at e-mail.  The high definition is just awesome at making the animations come alive and pop off the screen!  My only issue is with the actual web browser, "Silk".  There are times that messages appear saying the Tabs closed and aren't responding, this can be irritating when you have to keep restarting them.  Other than that drawback, I am really happy with this product & highly recommend it!!  :o)
Reviews.Title: My Favorite New Toy...Kindle Fire HD 8.9"  :o)

Reviews.Author: shannon
Reviews.Content: very fast delivery and a great product would tell all my family and friends . the kindle is a great buy
Reviews.Title: graet price and great product

Reviews.Author: Aden Hanaf
Reviews.Content: I have been using amazon since my early age and when they announced the tablet I was first ordered. When I received it was amazin tablet. Entertainments, reading and so on. I already recommended to my sis who are in uni and they also amazed to have it.
Reviews.Title: Great tablet for pro

Reviews.Author: Scott McClain
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife last christmas and she loves it.  She uses it every day and couldn't be happier.
Reviews.Title: Bought it for my wife.

Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: I've never owned a tablet device before but used my friends IPads.  Can't really say one is better than the other.  But for me, the Kindle is where it's at homeslices.  It may be a personal preference but I don't care for the IPad and everyone who's played with my Kindle seem impressed, as they should be!  Sound quality is outstanding, picture quality is amazing, really can't say enough good things.  Audible books are the perfect companion, fyi.
Reviews.Title: Blown away

Reviews.Author: Patty Cake
Reviews.Content: I love it! It's slim and pretty light, the graphics are fantastic. I think I play more games on it than read books, although I got it for the books. I also received an iPad for Christmas but I like the Kindle Fire better because it's lighter and does basically the same things. I do wish it had the camera facing front and back. I haven't tried this yet but it sounds like it would be difficult to get a good picture. It's much easier to get around in than the iPad. The sound is really good and I watched a video on it and the picture quality was really good.I have three Kindles now and use all three. I like my original one because I can read it on the beach, the Kindle Fire I got last year is easy to take when I have appointments because it's small, but this one does a lot more. I'm keeping them all active!
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD

Reviews.Author: Deborah Sizemore
Reviews.Content: I gave this to my husband for Christmas and he absolutely loves it!He also got me a Kindle 32 GB and it is awesome!
Reviews.Title: I Love It, love it, love it!

Reviews.Author: sueym
Reviews.Content: So far I am absolutely thrilled with my Kindle.  The only problem I have is that I can't play my facebook games.  If this could be fixed I would be ecstatic!
Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HD

Reviews.Author: Linda L.
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire is great!  I keep it next to my bed to read at night and it keeps disappearing because the whole family likes it.  My children watch video's and play games - they like the big screen.  My husband likes to use it for internet access around the house because it is so easy to use and carry.  Great purchase and very easy to use.
Reviews.Title: Fun and Easy

Reviews.Author: Robert Palmer
Reviews.Content: In Dec '11 I purchased the kindle fire and my wife and I kept fighting over it. So it lead me to buying the HD one Dec '12 and WOW can I just say its everything I wanted. Im not on my pc all the time and when I am it's short and sweet. But having the Kindle Fire HD i can do everything I need to in have as much time as powering up my pc. While the apps aren't nearly as many as Ipad it does offer more perks. With all the video and movie streaming apps out there I find prime has the best and newest selection. Also with the space on cloud I am not worried about what I down load slowing down the OS cause I can delete and add whatever later. And while having two kindles, with the cloud my wife and I can each read the same book at our own pace at no extra charge.  LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HD!!!!!
Reviews.Title: Love It

Reviews.Author: C. Meyer "cajunchris"
Reviews.Content: I do love my Kindle  Fire tablet. Really great value. Lots of features. I mostly use books, web, email, apps, and movies and videos.  Prime is a great feature.  I was able to keep grandkids  entertained at Christmas with games and movies. I bought cable hookup to TV and seen movies  on the big screen. GREAT. I am still learning about it.  3 things I wish were different--would like it to work with flash player to download programs from the web I am interested in. The speakers should be on the same side as the screen. U lose most of the sound.  Sometimes I have to choose picture or sound. Third, I wish there were more Apps.  Other than that, I would give 5 stars.
Reviews.Title: Great tablet

Reviews.Author: Harry DBH
Reviews.Content: Excellent!As always this was a great way to buy this from Amazon.  It was so much easier than getting out and going to my nearest store to get it. I live in a rural community and with Amazons fast shipping I got this before my next visit to town.
Reviews.Title: Excellent!

Reviews.Author: T. Schiel
Reviews.Content: Prime TV shows and movies, stream Netflix, plenty of apps and games, great screen, blue tooth....I use it daily. I don't use it for web search or email. I've got a computer that does those tasks better, but this tablet gets a workout.Minor quibbles are the volume control which should be controlled with a bezel switch and that flush on and off button which is hard to find in the dark but that's not enough to knock off a star. It's all manageable without too much trouble.I don't read on it since that works better on my 7" Fire but I didn't buy for reading, I bought it mainly for video and music and it does a great job on those.I snapped this up on that 50 buck discount day so this tablet was a real bargain.
Reviews.Title: Worth The Money

Reviews.Author: Emmaleigh "eeyorefive"
Reviews.Content: This was my second attempt at a tablet.  This one was better than the first one I got but I have had some trouble with this one. It freezes up so I have to turn it off. I've also had trouble with email too.I am not really happy with it and have sold it since it's past my return date.  I think I am giving up on tablets.
Reviews.Title: Okay Tablet.

Reviews.Author: Jim Dekker,Jr.
Reviews.Content: The Kindle is better then I expected it be. Has a very good picture and sound. I am very happy with it. I have a friend who is thinking about a Kindle or I-pad and I would definetly woul recomend the Kindle.
Reviews.Title: Awesome

Reviews.Author: Karen & Phil
Reviews.Content: I love the new Kindle HD 8.9, if only I had more time to sit and play with it to figure out everything it does. The web searching is faster than our laptop computer!
Reviews.Title: Awesome

Reviews.Author: Bugstress
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome tablet.  Unfortunately I transitioned to an IPAD mini because it is more of a "workhorse."  Thats because of all the business integration.  However, I am an Amazon lifer and kept my kindle keyboard and kindle fire 1st gen, because the games are better, graphics more crisp, and of course, Amazon makes it easy to keep all purchased content in cloud storage.
Reviews.Title: Great Tablet

Reviews.Author: Frank Roth
Reviews.Content: I did quite a lot of research on tablets before making my purchase, and the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 does not disappoint.
Reviews.Title: So far I really like it

Reviews.Author: Betty J. Biech
Reviews.Content: I like its size.I have not had it long enough to know everything about it.  However, I am having fun learning.  It is able to do everything that I was expecting, and more.It's a very handy device.I would recommend this to a friend
Reviews.Title: It's user friendly.

Reviews.Author: Ralph Kruse
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from the e-ink version and absolutely love it. I stream movies from HBO and netflix while I'm sitting on the couch.
Reviews.Title: Two months and no regrets.

Reviews.Author: Jany Kimble
Reviews.Content: LOVING MY KINDLE, SO EASY TO USE, GREAT PICTURES, EASY ON THE EYES, SO MANY APPS AND GAMES, AND FOR ME THE BOOKS ARE PLENTY...LOVE IT
Reviews.Title: AMAZING

Reviews.Author: Chia
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Kindle after doing 2 months of research between it and its popular rival who shall not be named. It's been a month and I have no regrets. It's an excellent e-reader. Having an Amazon product has its perks as well such as amazing customer service and a wide variety of ebooks. It's lightweight, simple to use and understand. Only issues I've had so far are the "tabs not responding" and a lack of a few apps I would have loved to be able to use. Overall, the Kindle Fire is a good bargain for it's buck.
Reviews.Title: Why did I wait so long?

Reviews.Author: Justamom "Justamom"
Reviews.Content: I was in the market for a tablet and with so many options available was unsure which to pick. I read up a lot on the Windows RT OS, native Android tablets, iPad and really found myself returning to the Kindle Fire HD. I had several co-workers with the original Kindle Fire and initially wasn't impressed. It wasn't until I found myself playing with the Kindle Fire HD in stores that I was truly blow away by Amazons forked version of Android, user experience and speed.Everything felt very simple and pleasant to move through. Amazon did not choke me down with product advertisements and things simply felt as they should be. The 32GB is sufficient for my needs and although I would have preferred expandable storage the Dolby audio was too irresistible. It's not often I feel like I can unplug my headphones and actually enjoy the sound coming out of a portable device. My daughter loves the Kindle FreeTime as do I. Overall, it's not the tablet itself that seals the deal it's the total package, especially for Prime members with Amazon video, the lending library and free apps of the day. I consider myself very frugal and definitely do not regret this purchase.
Reviews.Title: Pleasantly surprised

Reviews.Author: Merlin Caballero
Reviews.Content: My husband gave me the Kindle HD for xmas and is the best gift ever. He had given me the Kindle fire last year and I was very happy with it, but when I got my Kindle HD I was really able to see the difference between the two. The clarity is great. The only thing I do not like are the bottoms on the side for volume and to power it, can't hardly feel them and it does not have a light that tells you is charging or not, so you have to open it to see. Other than that it is a good buy, I love watching movies in it and with the HDMI cable I am able to play the movies or shows on my big TVs, that is an excellent option to have. Overall, you cannot go wrong with a Kindle HD and for the price, it is awesome. One other thing I like is that I am able to get an app for my magic jack and I can make phone calls with it. So, if you are going to get it I am sure you will enjoy it just like I do.
Reviews.Title: I love it.

Reviews.Author: Catherine Montressor
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I was tired of packing a bunch of boxes of books each time I moved. I also travel a lot and books weigh too much to be practical. I debated for months between Kindle Fire and iPad. I chose the Kindle Fire because I mainly wanted a place to keep my library.Now that I have it, I use it for much more. Free Skype access (and built-in camera lets me talk 'live), ability to keep a journal and make notes. I love the book features - highlighting, bookmarking, voice (a computer voice reads the text to you), ability to upload my documents.Then I discovered the free movies. OMG! The latest Mission Impossible - is FREE! And it downloads in less than a minute on WiFi. I am very impressed.And of course, the games. Good for those times you are waiting for something else to happen, like standing in line at the store, waiting for your food at a restaurant, you know ....I chose it for access to books, but now I use it more than I do my computer.
Reviews.Title: What a great idea

Reviews.Author: JM happy face
Reviews.Content: I had the kindle before but this one has many more features and it is in beautiful color. Great service from Amazon.
Reviews.Title: love it.

Reviews.Author: Dorothy Moseley
Reviews.Content: I've had my Kindle Fire for less than a week and I'm in love with it.  This is almost an extension of my right arm.  It does everyting I've seen the IPad do, and I love reading my books on the Fire.  Can't go wrong for quality and price. I used my Kindle Touch every day and I use the Fire even more.
Reviews.Title: WOW!

Reviews.Author: Eliza
Reviews.Content: This is a great product for a great price.  One of the best values out there in the world of tablets.
Reviews.Title: Great product!

Reviews.Author: Barb Matthey
Reviews.Content: Easy to use.  I bought it for my daughter and i but i can't get my daughter to share.  We both love it.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire

Reviews.Author: scapp
Reviews.Content: I had the Kindle Fire which I broke so they upgraded me to the Kindle Fire HD 7 " but I upgraded to this one for the screen size (I use it at school to follow along with power points in class). Let me say that it is absolutely worth the extra money! I love it and I think that the battery life is better on the 8.9" than it was on the 7". Also I like that the screen is large enough to show all but the offers on the home screen. Also I got the Otter Box case which I also love and I feel that my device is protected in my backpack. Thank you amazon for a great product, I'm definitely a Kindle girl !
Reviews.Title: LOVE IT !!!

Reviews.Author: Chet or Julie Fullerton "2hot2splash"
Reviews.Content: Absolutely one of the best buys on the market and might I add that Amazon is the finest company I have had the pleasure to work with.  Customer service is unbeatable.  Constantly upgrading their products and the Kindle 8.9 is another fine example.  The added size and resolution make this a "can't do without" item.
Reviews.Title: My 5th Kindle and each one better than the last!

Reviews.Author: Glenda Mahaffey
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a Christmas present to my husband who is so hard to buy for, but he was so surprised and loves it. Whenever he is not using it, I am using it! Great product.
Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire

Reviews.Author: Jeffrey A. Keehn
Reviews.Content: Or should I say my wife loves it.  The only time she let me touch it is to set up her email accounts.
Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this so much I purchased one for my son and his college studies.  He now uses this in place of his laptop when he goes to school or when he is waiting in between and works on his school projects.  He purchsed the Office product App for this and he is in love with it.
Reviews.Title: I love this

Reviews.Author: SEEH3
Reviews.Content: It was the perfect Christmas gift for my wife.  She loves it and takes it wherever she goes and uses it often.
Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift

Reviews.Author: Book_thyme
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure if I wanted a tablet or an ultra book when my mom bought me a kindle fire for my birthday. if I was going to invest in a tablet I thought I would want an Asus which has a little more functionality which had some more computer like abilities. However, now that I have had this for about two weeks I am very pleased with my gift. for what I have been using my tablet for it suits me quite well.What I like:1. This is a true media device and if you have amazon prime you will obtain the most out of this device2.I like how this device is linked to all my cloud items and easy to download3.I like that I can download all my Facebook pictures on to my device4. You can still download and view PowerPoint and pdfs on your kindle5.it has a Swype keyboard6. The sound is decentWhat I wish it had:1. That I could create a text document2. A more diverse app market similar to android3. wish it had expandable memoryI have not had any problems with their silk web browser. There is a small learning curve but play with it and it is easy to learn of you are up to speed with technological times. also if you have a kindle ereader you willnot need to purchase a chargerupdate: recently received an email from Amazon saying 11 cds(not mp3) I purchased in the past were available for mp3 download on my kindle and cloud player. One nice feature is I have the ability to close my kindle case or put it in sleep mode and still be able to stream the music.Also after reading through some reviews I realized the camera is functional for taking pictures with a flash,if you hit photos on the top menu bar, there is a camera icon in the top right corner.
Reviews.Title: I am pleased

Reviews.Author: Don Juan
Reviews.Content: Got this for my wife for Christmas she loves it ! It's just as good as a iPad 4 and $200 dollars cheaper son ^_^
Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HD

Reviews.Author: JAMES
Reviews.Content: I really love  my kindle fire . hd  , easy to use, easy to navigate  great hd. the only problem I have is the volume it does not seem  to be as loud as they  advertise. my son has a samsung galaxy 2 and it is much louder. Hopefully amazon will update the software and increase  the volume for us old guys. other than that a great tablet well done amazon
Reviews.Title: FIRE HD 8.9

Reviews.Author: annegirl
Reviews.Content: This kindle HD fire is an awesome piece of technology the graphics apps and everything this has is as great but maybe even a little better than the ipad.
Reviews.Title: Ammazingly brilliant picture, clarity better than the ipad actually

Reviews.Author: Pam "SMB,SLT"
Reviews.Content: This is my newest Fire and other than being a tad heavier than I really like it is a great device.  The cover I purchased automatically awakens the device when I open it and the quick charger (additional cost) does a great job of keeping me charged and playing games, reading, or watching videos.It seems to have a better wi-fi connection than does the older verson.  Same wi-fi at my house, but more bars on this Kindle.
Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Author: Laurie
Reviews.Content: It's awesome!! I would highly recommend it to anyone that loves to read, watch movies, check on Facebook activity, email accounts and lots of cool apps. Plus much more. You have to own one to see all the things it can do. I'm not new to the Kindle. This is my third one and they just keep getting better! Great job Amazon. Thank you!!
Reviews.Title: I don't go anywhere without it!!!

Reviews.Author: JS1
Reviews.Content: I have had e-readers for as many years as they have been available, and this is such a leap to a great upgrade.  This cross between a laptop/tablet and an e-reader is everything I expected and much more.  It takes a little time to acquaint yourself with all the features, but I love it and how it is mostly intuitive.  I do think it is important to purchase it from Amazon, since some friends of mine purchased theirs at other outlets and were clueless how to set it up.  My Amazon account allowed for it to be user-ready when I received it and sync with my email and desktop computer immediately, along with providing me access to all the books I had purchased previously and quick purchase and download capabilities for future purchases.
Reviews.Title: Such Fun!

Reviews.Author: Brian "Brian Freeman"
Reviews.Content: I bought this even though I have the iPad 3 because I wanted to be able to have my Kindle books read to me by a decent sounding text-to-speech voice while I drive. This does that perfectly.  I also love how some audible.com books can be purchased at a discount when you buy books on the Kindle.I am a Prime member and watch the streaming shows on it too.  This device is perfect if you are an Amazon / book junkie like me. I am glad I have it to compliment my iPad.
Reviews.Title: Perfect for consuming Amazon content

Reviews.Author: CaroleAnn
Reviews.Content: I upgraded to the Fire HD after realizing I may never purchase another hardback/paperback again! Having the extensive book selection available for instant download from Amazon is better than living next door to a library. My problem with library rentals was that the borrowed book had to be returned within the designated time limit whether I had finished reading it or not- no such problem with the Kindle. I love having a selection on my Kindle and being able to read and finish it at my convenience. I appreciate the excellent selection of apps available, whether free or for a nominal cost- so does our young grandson...an avid 'Angry Birds' fan.  I'm anxious to see how well the non-glare aspect of the Fire HD performs this summer while reading outside on the sunny porch. The one thing I miss on the HD is the little light on the on/off switch on my Kindle Fire  that turns from amber to green when the unit is fully charged. Except for that, I'm very happy with the upgrade- I feel it is well worth the cost of purchase!
Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire...

Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: Bigger, bolder screen, HD quality, sound is incredible ... what's not to love?  And now our younger son can inherit the 7" Kindle FIRE (great device as well .. just went new for Christmas).
Reviews.Title: Upgraded from Kindle FIRE

Reviews.Author: jojo25
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my daughter who is in her 3rd year of college.  She loves the versatility of using it as a reader, a textbook resource as well as a research tool. Easier than a laptop to haul around.  Best buy ever.
Reviews.Title: Great tool for college

Reviews.Author: Charlie
Reviews.Content: Love it and use it for all things.  First thing I open in the morning and last item to close at night.  Love the color, the easy use and understanding of the product.  Highly recommend.
Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Author: Tim Fox
Reviews.Content: I also had one of the original Kindle Fires. I used it some, but not extensively.I'm really glad I upgraded! The enhanced graphics and larger screen are great. Web browsing is much easier (for my 'older' eyes), The sound is amazing! Reading on it is easy - I've even started back doing more reading again.I looked at more expensive devices with more functionality but chose the 8.9 Fire.Love this device. The functionality and price point were just right.
Reviews.Title: Great device!

Reviews.Author: Steve Bell
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD 8.9 is a very cool tablet/e-reader.  The video quality is second to none and the back lighting for reading is a great improvement, as I do most of my reading at night or in a vehicle at work (don't tell anyone).  It's a bit more difficult to hold and it takes a bit of getting used to because of the format, but it is an awesome gadget to have on the road and in places where the laptop just can't travel.  Highly recommended for the price
Reviews.Title: Very cool

Reviews.Author: marvin smith
Reviews.Content: all i can say that it was a gift for my wife and she was and still is super happy.
Reviews.Title: my kindle fire hd purchase

Reviews.Author: TheQ's
Reviews.Content: I have multiple Kindles and love them all, especially my new Kindle Fire HD.  I am so happy with it that when my friends were asking me to show how it works I got carried away and sounded to myself like a salesperson!
Reviews.Title: I love my Kindles!

Reviews.Author: J. Kopchok
Reviews.Content: Have been using this device since December. Bought both the 7 in. and 8.9" to compare and decided to stick with this larger unit. No !question the smaller device was easier to handle and the decision wasn't as simple as I hoped. The faster processor and slightly larger screen won me over. I have side-loaded several apps that weren't available on Amazon and everything works great. I supplemented the  purchase with a Roo Origami cover and it's fabulous.
Reviews.Title: Great for my streaming movies

Reviews.Author: Daileyk05
Reviews.Content: I have really been enjoying my new Kindle Fire HD 8.9".  I had an older Kindle so my next purchase was going to be a tablet of some sort for playing games and surfing the web, but when my original Kindle died, I decided to invest in the Kindle Fire HD 8.9" and I'm so glad I did!  The color and clarity is awesome and the sound is amazing.  I would recommend this Kindle...it's a great buy for the price.
Reviews.Title: I'm really loving my new Kindle Fire HD 8.9"

Reviews.Author: mary pankratz
Reviews.Content: the kinkle was a christmas gift for my son and he loved it.  He is very impressed with the hd screen
Reviews.Title: kindle fire

Reviews.Author: Joy L. Dabbs
Reviews.Content: Love ,Love this Kindle it is great and can stand up to most tablets too. Best part is it is easy to use I am 67 and can figure it anyone can don't let this one slip by again a great value !!
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9

Reviews.Author: Anita Tiller
Reviews.Content: My husband loved the kindle fire hd 8.9.  He did not think he would use one but I know him better than he knows himself.  He absolutely love it.  He thinks Santa was great this year.
Reviews.Title: love, love, love

Reviews.Author: Nicole Rodney
Reviews.Content: love it the only thing that's missing is a camera its kinda crazy that this device offers so much but not a actual camera
Reviews.Title: kindle fire 8.9

Reviews.Author: cheryl scibelli
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating beacause I cannot live without it now!  Having so much fun with it, and it goes everywhere with me!
Reviews.Title: My Kindle

Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: This is my 5th kindle and I love the bigger screen and HD feature. They are so great for traveling, sitting by the pool, waiting in the parking lot. I would recommend kindle to everyone.
Reviews.Title: Kindle's are awesome

Reviews.Author: Joyce A. Gilpin
Reviews.Content: This was a gift to my son and he simply LOVES it. No problems, whatsoever. We couldn't be happier. excellent...
Reviews.Title: Everything we wanted and MORE...

Reviews.Author: Ruby M. Niccum
Reviews.Content: I like this product very well and the print is very easy to read.  It is also very easy to hold.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"

Reviews.Author: DTheisen
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD 8.9 is everything I was looking for in a tablet, and at a very reasonable price. I use it just about every day.. to read books, catching up on Downton Abbey, and play my games.
Reviews.Title: Love my new Kindle Fire HD

Reviews.Author: K.Bnck
Reviews.Content: I have never owned a tablet before, but have played with my mother's ipad often. This Kindle Fire is every bit as user friendly. Navigation is different than the Apple products, but easy to figure out with trial and error. I downloaded a cheap ($.99) user guide from Amazon which was very helpful.Email set up was a breeze, watched my first rented movie and the screen quality and music quality are just fantastic. Nothing took away from my enjoyment of the movie (Pride and Prejudice- highly recommend it!!).The battery life if amazing. Much longer than my Android phone doing the same amount of web surfing, emailing, etc...My son tells me not to charge it until it is dead, not sure if that is true, but I follow his advice :)One thing to learn is that to remove content from your device, you need to log on to your Amazon account and choose "Manage my Kindle" . Of course you can download anything by starting from  your device ("Store"), but to REMOVE items you need to log in to your account. This will allow you to add and delete your Library of books, music, and video. Amazon has an ok selection of movies, but I was disappointed that one movie I wanted was not available for rent or to own. Not sure why this was the case.
Reviews.Title: So Addicting!

Reviews.Author: KOENIGS
Reviews.Content: A XMAS GIFT FOR MY WIFE, SHE LOVES IT. ONE OF OUR FRIENDS HAS AN APPLE TABLET, AFTER SHE SAW THE KINDLE SHE IS GETTING RID OF THE APPLE TABLET
Reviews.Title: GIFT FOR MY WIFE

Reviews.Author: Denise
Reviews.Content: I have always been a huge fan of reading paperback books, never was without one, but with the Kindle and Nooks getting more and more popular I started checking them out.  It took me a few months to seriously start looking at them and then the new Kindle Fire HD 8.9 came out and I decided this was for me.  So glad I got it (Christmas present to myself :)!!!!!!Didn't realize It was so much more than just a book reader. Love, love, love it!!!!! So glad I talked myself into getting it.If you are looking for one of these devices, this is the one to get.
Reviews.Title: Love, Love this!!

Reviews.Author: Sally Rogers
Reviews.Content: Me and my family are more than happy with the Kindle Fire 8.9".  We use it daily and the entire family loves it!  Defintely recommend for a family!
Reviews.Title: Fabulous Purchase

Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: I retired in June . I wanted something to keep my mind stimulated. When I learned about all the games on the Kindle, I had to have it. I've read several books. Now I'm kin to a Kindle family. Your customer service is excellent.
Reviews.Title: Funtastic

Reviews.Author: Itchypanda
Reviews.Content: I use my Kindle Fire HD 8.9 every day. With an Amazon Prime membership, this device is a dream. I'm definitely part of the Amazon eco-system, purchasing books, movies and general products from the main website.There are only 2 things holding me back from giving this a five-star review:1) The native Silk web browser does not intentionally come with Flash support.  Yes, I know you can enable Flash support but the image quality is much better through a sideapp called Dolphin.  If you don't believe me, download Dolphin, watch a youtube video with HD resolution on Dolphin and then switch over to the Silk browser with Flash support and watch the same video.  It's like night and day.  The Dolphin browser with Flash support runs smoother and looks better than the Silk browser with enabled Flash support.  I don't like side loading apps because it may hinder the device now or in the future.2) Netflix looks like 480i on an HD screen.  I have a high bandwidth of wi-fi at my home.  I stream Netflix on my Roku and X-Box 360 player without a single hiccup and picks up a 720p stream instantly.  The Kindle Fire HD 8.9 simply looks muddy in comparison.  I know people on this review forum have stated they have no issue with Netflix on their Kindle Fire HD 8.9 but I think they must be resolved to watch it on 480i.  I unfortunately want Netflix streaming at the highest resolution possible (720p, as advertised by Netflix and Amazon).  I've checked my wi-fi, through countless forums dedicated to Kindle Fires and Netflix and no one has a solution.  People have simply given up watching Netflix on the Kindle Fire HD or just shrug their shoulders and watch it in 480i.  Just as a comparison, I watched 13 Samurai through my Amazon Prime and again through my Netflix account.  The Amazon Prime version of 13 Samurai looked beautiful (great color separation and image quality) and streamed 720p with no issue on my Kindle Fire HD 8.9.  When watching 13 Samurai through my Netflix account, the Kindle Fire HD looked muddy and bland (Yes, I wandered everywhere in my house to make sure it wasn't an issue with wi-fi interference and at one point kept the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 next to the wi-fi port to ensure the best quality).  I also watched the movie for an hour hoping the image quality was going to improve on the Kindle Fire HD 8.9.  The image never improved.  Just to ease my mind, I streamed 13 Samurai through Netflix on my Roku player and it looked similar to the Amazon Prime on my Kindle Fire HD 8.9 (excellent quality).  I'm hoping and praying that a Netflix or Amazon representative is reading this and can resolve to fix this issue.  I like the convenience of watching Netflix anywhere but I have to watch on my Roku for now.  If the Netflix issue is ever resolved, I will change my review from a 4-star review to a 5-star review.  I can live with the limited Silk web browser but not this muddy-looking Netflix.Excellent device, especially if you have an Amazon Prime membership.
Reviews.Title: Almost perfect...

Reviews.Author: DON CLONTZ
Reviews.Content: GREAT FOR BOOK READERS, MOVIE WATCHERS, ETC.  ABLE TO FIND ANY INFORMATION YOU ARE LOOKING FOR.  WOULD RECOMMEND FOR ANYONE.
Reviews.Title: GREAT

Reviews.Author: Charles E. Brock "C.E.B."
Reviews.Content: There are so many things that this kindle can do and I don't know how to do most of them.  However, I also have a kindle keyboard that I love.  I primarily read books on my kindles and having the added size (it is a little heavier to hold than the keyboard kindle but that is not a problem for me) of the screen is good for me.  I like that i can read with a black background and white letters and I can move the screen to read in two directions.  I have gotten to love the touch system as well.  I look forward to learning the other uses.  The screen is absolutely sharp and clear - much more than my keyboard.I have not used the sound nor the camera so I cannot comment on them.  I believe that this is an excellent product and I would recommend it in a heart-beat. I purchased the faster charger and I would most certainly recommend this and the cover that can stand.  I use the cover as a protection and have bought a cover with each of the three previous kindles that i have had before getting the kindle fire.  Even if you think you would not like this way to read over the "real" books and i was the same until I tried my first kindler, there is no problem as you can do both if you wish.  I read much more with the kindle now.
Reviews.Title: Love this kindle

Reviews.Author: DA BISHOP
Reviews.Content: THIS IS THE ABSOLUTELY WORTH IN MY MOTHER ACCEPTED FROM ME AS A GIFT AND I MEAN SHE NEVER PUTS IT DOWN
Reviews.Title: WORTH EVERY PENNY

Reviews.Author: joeytree
Reviews.Content: First, I should explain that I just purchased a Kindle Fire HD 8.9", and am now waiting for it to arrive. So, look to other reviews for an idea of exactly how this tablet works (of which there are plenty). This review is to try and clear up some common misconceptions in the various comparison reviews I've seen with respect to the screen resolution. Most of the reviews which compare the Fire HD 8.9" vs. iPad (retinal) vs. Nexus 10 will refer to the actual number of pixels. Such a comparison is misleading and irrelevant, as the resolution number which matters is the ppi (pixels per inch). This is because the screens of these three devices are all different sizes.More specifically, the Fire HD 8.9" has an 8.9" display with an aspect ratio of 16:10 (i.e., wide-screen TV). The Nexus 10 also has an aspect ratio of 16:10, but has a 10" screen. Thus, the Nexus 10 would need to have more pixels that the Fire HD 8.9" just to maintain the same resolution (i.e., ppi). The iPad (retinal) is 9.7", but has a 4:3 aspect ratio (i.e., old school TV). So you can just throw the actual number of pixels out the  window for this comparison. Furthermore, the only number that really affects clarity is the ppi (just like the dpi number for printers). Here's a break down so you can see what I'm talking about:Fire HD 8.9" is an 8.9" screen with 1920×1200 pixels, which yields a resolution of 254 ppi.Nexus 10 is a 10" screen with 2560×1600 pixels, which yields a resolution of 300ppi.iPad (retinal) is a 9.7" screen with 2048×1536 pixels, which yields a resolution of 264 ppi.These are not calculations I did, but tech specs obtained from the web (Amazon and Apple list their ppis, while I needed a Google search for the ppi of the Nexus 10).So, while the iPad (retinal) seems to have a number of pixels close to the Nexus 10, its actual resolution is actually just about the same as the Fire HD 8.9". Further more, the screen length is just about the same from the pictures I've seen (also indicated by the 1920 length pixels of the Fire HD 8.9 compared to the 2048 length pixels of the iPad). So, while any 4:3 videos or images will be larger on the iPad, and wide screen videos (i.e., just about all modern movies and TV shows) will be just about the same size.The resolution of the Nexus 10 is clearly higher than the other two tablets (by roughly 20%). This should make a difference when viewing text and possibly photographs or other static images (provided the images themselves have a resolution of at least 300 dpi). However, HD video right now is a max of 1080p, which corresponds to a resolution of 1920×1080 pixels (2.1 megapixel) (as obtained from Wikipedia). Thus, I am not sure you would see a difference in video quality with the Nexus 10, as the limiting clarity factor with each of the three devices is the actual image resolution and not the screen resolution. If there is an upscaling program in the Nexus 10, then the video image might be better. Otherwise, you're not likely to see a difference.It should also be noted that while the Nexus 10 has a comparable screen diagonal to the iPad, the difference in aspect ratios means that the Nexus 10 has a longer screen than the iPad (i.e., bigger wide screen picture), while the iPad has a wider screen than the Nexus 10 (i.e., bigger standard 4:3 screen than the iPad). This means that while movies will be larger on the Nexus 10, magazines and other print media will be larger on the iPad. Similarly, web pages (which your most likely to browse in landscape mode) will be easier to navigate and view on the iPad.I should also note that Ultra HD is a technology that is just getting off the ground. The resolution for Ultra HD is at least 4 times that of regular HD, with a resolution of 3840×2160 (8.3 megapixels). However, there's not much, if any, video content that currently uses Ultra HD. Add that to the fact that any tablet will likely be outdated by the time Ultra HD takes off, and the increased ppi on the Nexus 10 is likely an irrelevant factor (as opposed to with TVs, which you may intend to replace only once a decade or so). Also, with the small screen size of tablets, I'm not sure how much of a difference the naked eye could actually detect between regular HD and Ultra HD.In conclusion, if all you want is an HD tablet to read books and other media, and to view streaming video (like me), then the Fire HD 8.9" is a no brainer compared to the other tablets since it is by far the least expensive option and you're not likely to find the additional features/benefits of either of the other two tablets worth the increased price. However, if you need increased functionality and/or access to more apps, then it's likely a toss-up between the Nexus 10 and the iPad depending upon your individual wants/needs. The hassle-free usability and user friendly operation of Apple's products would lead me to spend the extra $100 and get the iPad over the Nexus 10, but that's just my personal preference.UPDATE:I just received my device yesterday and love it. The New Yorker app seems to have a glitch, but the device worked flawlessly otherwise. I've been using my wife's iPad 2 for the past three weeks and easily like the HD 8.9" just as much--if not more. The print for books is cristal clear with no noticeable pixilation--unlike the original fire and my wife's iPad 2 which I refuse to use to read books. Netflix and Amazon Instant video work flawlessly, and I've had no problems with the web browser yet--though you should see other reviews for downloading a different browser if you experience Flash issues. The Free-Time Unlimited app is also pretty awesome if you have kids. Even my two-and-a-half year old was fascinated by it, and the locking features allow me to let her play with it without me having to keep correcting her--as I need to do when we let her use the ABC Mouse app on the iPad since she can access the web by merely swiping her hand across the screen.If you all you want to do is surf the web, read books, and watch streaming video, then this is the perfect option--especially since you can get a "used" (which I understand to be refurbished or returned shortly after receiving since this product is pretty new) HD 8.9" with 32 GB and no adds for $285 (including shipping). That's $15 less than a new 16 GB version with adds!The only down-side is that the apps are noticeably more limited than on the iPad. As of this review, I can't get the Optimum cable app, the Showtime app, or the ABS Mouse app (a great children's app). I'm hoping that this will change soon since HBO Go is currently available, but I have no idea how long I'll have to wait. Personally though, combining the cost savings with the Free-Time Unlimited app--which offsets the unavailability of ABC Mouse in my book--I still say the Fire HD 8.9" beats out the iPad by quite a margin.
Reviews.Title: Clearing Up Misinformation

Reviews.Author: Irish
Reviews.Content: What you get for the price can't be beat.  I love the large display, the sound is great, and the camera takes decent quality photos.  The touch screen can be sensitive at times, and other times it won't register my finger at all, but it's not a frequent occurance.  I've borrowed books from my library using this as well.  I love this tablet!
Reviews.Title: Best Christmas gift ever

Reviews.Author: B. Edwards
Reviews.Content: Got my new Kindle about a month ago and I absolutely love it.I used to have the old 7", original version, and loved it, too, but the big screen plus HD are a major upgrade. Audio and video stream flawlessly, and the HD is beautiful.Skype also works great with the new camera.The two added speakers on the back are really nice, and the new external volume button helps. I also like that you can access your favorites any time by tapping the star, and the full 360 rotation works great.As many other reviewers have noted, you have to unlock the screen for your Kindle to work with many cases. They are not backwards.Overall, I could not be more pleased with my purchase.
Reviews.Title: Beautiful, fast, flawless

Reviews.Author: BluesHawk707
Reviews.Content: There are more than 2000 reviews so I won't go into great detail but I'll share my two cents - I love it!  This Kindle Fire HD is on par with the iPad in every way.  It is easy to set up and use.  My two-year old can use it without any problem.  I have Amazon Prime and it works great with the large collection of TV shows and movies.  I am happy I bought it and strongly recommend it.  The sound and picture are terrific.  Way to go Amazon!
Reviews.Title: An Absolute Joy to Own

Reviews.Author: ashrod
Reviews.Content: for the most part it is easy to use. Unfortunately I have had some problems with it freezing up, without any way to remedy without shutting down, if it allows it.  I also think that it is odd that when you purchase the Kindle it arrives without any way to charge it, unless you purchase the charger separately and then the charger shows up a couple of days later.
Reviews.Title: Nice size and features.

Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: Love all things about this devise. Great to read from, watch movie or browse the web. Exceeded my expectations. Highly recommended. Clear screen with great HD.
Reviews.Title: Wow!

Reviews.Author: KWK
Reviews.Content: It's fast, capable, and the picture is great.  The kids love it (freetime is terrific) for games, movies, and books.  We really have enjoyed using it as a portable movie device through the HDMI to the different screens around the house with Netflix and Prime videos.
Reviews.Title: Everything I want in a tablet

Reviews.Author: Debi Lucas
Reviews.Content: So far we have no problem whatsoever with the Kindle Fire.  We love the screen size, at our age, we need it, especially when playing some of the games and Word.  We haven't tried music, videos or the camera yet.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"

Reviews.Author: Cynthia Jones
Reviews.Content: I love it more than I expected. Data plan is a very good deal. I have recommended it to friends.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD review

Reviews.Author: Sooner1906
Reviews.Content: I bought the first generation fire a couple of months after it was released, I was happy with it despite some technical glitches and issues...it served its purpose well as a media consumption device. Two months ago my wife bought me the Kindle Fire HD 8.9, and it blew me away. Every complaint that I had about the original fire was addressed, and then some. The 8.9 is great, it serves its purpose as a media consumption device but its size makes it useful for school work also (buy a good BT keyboard). Some people complain about the ads, but honestly I enjoy them, some of the advertisements are pretty cool and some of the offers are pretty good. In my opinion it is not worth $15 to disable them.Pros:-A must have for Amazon prime members-fast and powerful processing and browsing-great screen resolution-Great speakers (this was a major complaint with the original fire I can now watch NBA league pass with the speakers turned up without earphones)-Great price-Great book/movie/app selection-X-Ray (I didn't think i would use this feature at first but it is actually pretty cool. Watching movies and being able to get information and recommendations is great)-Upgraded the silk browser (I didn't love the original silk browser but this version is pretty awesome, the suggestions and bookmark tab is very useful)Free time (love this app, easy to set up and very useful for anyone who has kids)-Upgraded book and magazine experience (scrolling and page turning animations are smoother, pages look crisp and easy on the eyes).Cons:-Customization (This is really a stretch considering the fact that i actually like the UI used for the fire, but it is not a native android experience and thus not very customization)-No memory expansion (this would have taken the 8.9 from 5 stars to 7 stars. I understand why Amazon did not do it but it would have been nice)-No front facing camera or GPS (these are really minor issues, there was only one time where I could have used the front facing camera but I also have a smart phone so no real complaint)I love my Kindle fire HD I would recommend it to anyone. Amazon really stepped up their game with this product!
Reviews.Title: The Ultimate Fire!

Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 for my wife as a Christmas present.  She was always complaining that she could never get on the computer because of me!  I will not make this a long review, as others have already done so.  I will say, however, that the Kindle has exceeded all of my wife's expectations, as well as my own.  It was not difficult to set the email account up with Verizon on the Kindle.  She has enjoyed the Facebook app. and uses it daily.  She finds it very easy to surf through the Internet, and equally as easy to send and receive email.  I have had a lot of fun with Amazon Prime watching the old Western "B" movies...movies I have not seen in 50 years--Roy Rogers, Johnny Mack Brown, Gene Autry, etc.  There are an awful lot of movies offered through Amazon Prime that are free to download, and I find this feature to be most useful and a super value.  New owners of a Kindle get a free 30 day membership with Prime, and after that, it is $79 a year.  I expect full well to renew after the 30 days is up.  I did have one problem however;  for some reason I was unable to download videos after 10 days.  I called Amazon service on a weekend, and they told me they would turn it over to the technical department.  I called the next day to see the status of it, and was told it would take up to 3 business days to address my problem.  I received an email from Amazon late the same day, tried the video downloads, and yep, it is now working.  As far as the charger not included with the unit, I don't think that is a big deal.  I purchased a wall charger, cord, car charger and a nice protective leather (like) cover for under $15.00 over E-Bay which included shipping.  So, I was able to purchase the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 for $249.00 on a one day only sale, and I think this was a terrific value for the money.  Knowing what I know now, would I make the same decision?  Absolutely!  There may be better tablets out there, but for the price and the value received, I don't think you can beat the Kindle....
Reviews.Title: Great value!

Reviews.Author: Kris James
Reviews.Content: My husband is good with computers, but slow to adapt to new technology. Over the past few years he's slowly joined the mobile device age. Before his birthday in October, he said he wanted a tablet for a combination birthday-Christmas present, but he didn't know which one. We both did hours of research on the various options (and boy are there a lot), but in the end, there was only one obvious choice for us: the Kindle Fire HD 8.9".My husband uses it to check his fantasy sports teams while watching the games on TV, so the wi-fi version is perfect for us. Its speed is impressive, and the screen size helps him avoid the mobile versions of his favorite websites (traditionalist, isn't he?). The tablet's sensitivity is pretty awesome, too. We were playing a game app involving rolling balls and navigable mazes, and I swear, I could feel the weight of the pixel ball as it bumped around the wooden barriers.We're Amazon Prime members, as well, so the freedom to continue watching our favorite free shows and movies was a definite factor in choosing another Kindle device for our household.
Reviews.Title: Complete Success!

Reviews.Author: av Joe
Reviews.Content: The screen is big enough to read easily.The web pages load pretty fast off the WIFI internet.Apps open and close pretty fast.That is pretty much 98% of what you want from this machine.If this is what you expect from this machine, you will be happy.This is not a laptop.
Reviews.Title: good enough

Reviews.Author: gail weatherbee
Reviews.Content: did alot of research on tablets and when they say the resolution is equal to or better to the IPAD then it is.  love the APPS and the internet access.  Have already bought one for my son.
Reviews.Title: oh yes!n

Reviews.Author: Susan Davis
Reviews.Content: At first, I was totally overwhelmed by the Kindle when comparing it to my mother in law's IPad.  Then, I purchased an eye opening e-book that explained everything in easy to understand language.  From that day on, I am so thrilled I purchased the Kindle FIre 8.9 4G LTE instead.  Love the graphics and the sound and it's fast!!!  LOVE IT!
Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HD 8.9..easy

Reviews.Author: RICK EZERSKY
Reviews.Content: This is my third Kindle & the Fire is the best so far. The HD resolution is awesome. The main reason I bought it is I read a lot at night and with the back lighted screen I don't have to get up and shut the light off. Also the pictures & maps are larger than on my Kindle Touch.I recommend it.
Reviews.Title: Excellent

Reviews.Author: Jane Deaton
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my new Kindle Fire HD 8.9". It responds so quickly, I am able to download the books I enjoy without difficulty. I also downloaded scriptures which I used at church this past week and I was able to find chapter and verse and follow along without any problem. I am totaly impressed. I look forward to watching movies, and downloading pictures. No complaints at all. I did much research and reading of comments. Thank you for selling such a good product.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"

Reviews.Author: allison johnson
Reviews.Content: Well I want one of these for myself..my daughter has been on it since Christmas eve.  she loves it and soon I will have one too.  Thanks and Happy New Year
Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HD

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Seeds of Love"
Reviews.Content: I don' t give away accolades without merit ... Amazon has surpassed my expectations with the 8.9" Fire. Received today and everything is working 100 percent. I have not had a problem with operations or functionality. Learning to setup the device and navigate from one app to the other has been smooth.
Reviews.Title: Blown Away!

Reviews.Author: Hattie B. Holtapp "guh"
Reviews.Content: I love this thing.
