Reviews.Content: My original Kindle Fire was getting rather used up and when this one was on sale (around Thanksgiving), I snatched it up! So glad I did! This is truly my favorite possession. I am either reading or playing games - some free, some paid. Amazon has plenty of each. The screen size is so much better than my old one (old was 7"), colors are bright and vivid. No ghosting during games. I did buy the adapter for accelerated charging, as the original plug seemed to take much longer than I wanted to wait.
Reviews.Title: Awesome!

Reviews.Author: DIGITALSHOOTER "Canon5D-man"
Reviews.Content: The Kindle, regardless of which version you own, is a leap into the world of brilliant Technology and the very active & colorful brain of, Mr. Jeff Bezos...The Kindle is a device that has just begun to give back what it has been designed to do, which is so very little in the span of where it may be in just 5 short years. I find it to be somewhat frightening, for the unknown usually is a land that brings good & bad, but for sure, a land of the unexpected...What the Kindle offers to date, is an amazing array of educational & entertainment entities, combined with a plethora of Apps and communication objects, that are constantly evolving...It is one of the most important devices to come along, in the world of Tablets...
Reviews.Title: Another Bezos Success Story

Reviews.Author: Jo A.
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my husband for when he travels for work. I thought he could watch movies, play his solitaire and maybe even read a book. Reading has never been his "thing". Well- he has used it nonstop. For the man who read 5 books , maybe, his entire 62 years - he has become a reading machine. He has read 5 books since I gave it to him April 1st. He is really enjoying it. The kindle fire HD itself is a great tablet. Very easy to set up email and use. It's even better if you have Prime so you can get free movies and books. I bought 2 of the 7" ones (also refurbished) for my grandsons for Christmas this past year and they love them, too. No problems at all with them being refurbs.  And this "previous generation" has the front facing camera which is nice for Skype.  Would recommend the Kindle Fire HD to all.  Footnote-- I did pay to remove Special Offers on all three kindle fire HDs that I bought. Just don't like the ads and was worth the $15 extra for each one.
Reviews.Title: Created a monster!

Reviews.Author: Gary P. Goersch
Reviews.Content: and she is constantly on it.  She has no complaints.  well...maybe one....she wishes it supported FLASH so that she could play her facebook games using the browser.
Reviews.Title: Gift for Wife

Reviews.Author: Rita Knierim
Reviews.Content: I returned a defective Kindle Fire HD 8.9 because the screen kept freezing and the silk browser was not responding much of the time.  The replacement is no better.  I am often shutting down and restarting just to play a game!  Next time I will buy a tablet from someone else.
Reviews.Title: unhappy kindle user

Reviews.Author: Mark F.
Reviews.Content: This is my fourth Kindle. I bought it mainly because it was an exceptional value for the price. It's larger than the more common 7" tablets, the display resolution is excellent, dual-band Wifi, HDMI out, decent speakers, battery life, 32 GB memory, etc. etc.But... eventually I felt overly constrained by the restrictive software environment. The user interface is designed to continually try to sell Amazon content. It's not friendly with Google Apps, which I am heavily invested in. The Silk browser is sub-par and the apps selection in the Amazon Store too limited and in some cases overpriced. Eventually I did what many others have - erased the Amazon operating system and replaced it with a generic Android OS. It's given the tablet a new lease on life. I can now use all of Google's apps and any others in the Android marketplace. It also seems more stable and reliable. It's now one of my favorite devices.Bottom line - 4.5 stars for the hardware, 1.5 for the software and restricted environment.
Reviews.Title: Love the hardware...

Reviews.Author: James M. Trainor
Reviews.Content: 17 months after purchase the battery gave out.no way to replace the battery?eh, what is with that?It was OK when it functioned.  But a black screen after 17 months?Seems like a design flaw to me!Update:Support actually helped!From "Clifford with Amazon Kindle Support.""1. Press and hold the Power button for a full 20 seconds. Your Kindle Fire will shut down while you hold the Power button, which is normal.2. After 20 seconds, release the Power button.3. Press the Power button again to restart your Kindle Fire."I don't know what caused the problem anymore than I know that which cured it.  Something brought the Kindle back to life and now I must eat some crow.While, to me, the unchangeable battery is a head scratch-er, the price benefit ratio for this tablet seems pretty good AS LONG AS IT WORKS. It is now working.  If it continues to do so through the foreseeable  future then it will have earned the 5 stars I am including in this update.
Reviews.Title: when it died it died

Reviews.Author: tom "grandpa"
Reviews.Content: bought husband a kindle to get back to  a good book for relaxation and enjoyment.  the absolute best quality product at an excellent price on Amazon!
Reviews.Title: back to a good book

Reviews.Author: books for the soul "book lover"
Reviews.Content: Many wonder about that one word: refurbished.  Maybe I can relieve some of that anxiety.  I work in an Electronic industry and canvouch that refurbished does not mean 'bad, less good, only works sometimes, will break sooner, looks bad' or any other worries associated with that word.  Companies have to use that word so consumers don't confuse a 'brand new, out of the box' item with an item that has been returned for any number of reasons, not that it's just broke.  Companies have to verify that the item is in good working order to turn it around and sell back to the public.  My kindle is working fabulously.  No glitches, hitches or harrumphs.  The consumer who is not afraid of the word can almost always save a few dollars on that special item they've been hoping for.  Research the item and learn before you buy no matter what it is, just don't be afraid.  Amazon makes a good product and they have to stand behind it, so buy with confidence.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire (refurbished) is Excellent

Reviews.Author: Jean Hilderbrand
Reviews.Content: There were absolutely no instructions for using this gadget.  We could not even turn it on -- there was no off/on switch.  There was no charger included so the thing was worthless and we could not use it.  It was recommended for us as my 84 year old husband can no longer read well because with this item he should be able to enlarge the type so he can see it.  There were no instructions for downloading books or how to do anything with it.  A great disappointment.
Reviews.Title: A great disappointment

Reviews.Author: Robert J. Budnick
Reviews.Content: User friendly, easy to understand and easy to navigate.  This quality product provides superior viewing.  In the end, the most notable factor is neither operational ease or quality; it's Amazon's amazing customer service.  Buying from Amazon is like dealing with an honest and reputable  family member.
Reviews.Title: Perfect for the brain dead...like me

Reviews.Author: Charissa Comar
Reviews.Content: I have 2 of these AND 3 of  the Kindle HDX .  I purchased them first for my kids,then myself , my husband.  Somewhere along the way the HDX  fatwas introduced, so.......we had to get. Those too!!!  We are all  "Kindled-up" for now and  we love them!!  They are so easy to use!  My 4. year old mastered it in no time. Love those parental controls!!!  I can't tell. The difference between my hd  and my new HDX!  If you're looking f o r  an outstanding product for the greatestvalue get the 8.9 hd.  The HDX is awesome but a bit pricey.  This unit and this size are pretty perfect.  You won't be disappointed!  If you have an iPad- it's going to collect a lot of dust once your KIndle HD arrives,!!!!
Reviews.Title: Kindle HD 8.9 is Pretty Darn Perfect!

Reviews.Author: Harvey A. Hicks "der swede"
Reviews.Content: I like the size and the sound.However it was adverticed as being able to read in the sun, but it is not much better than my old Kindlefire.  Also it doesn't have a light that tells you when it is fully charged like my old kindlefire, I miss this.
Reviews.Title: It is a good reader.

Reviews.Author: D. Rusk
Reviews.Content: For years I didn't see a need for a Tablet.  Now that I have the Kindle Fire HD 8.9 I see what I was missing.  I wasn't sure about getting a refurbished product, but knowing Amazon's customer focus I knew I could return or exchange it if there was a problem.  Note that the auto dimming doesn't work like your cell phone;'s (or at least like my Samsung S4).  However, if you get the Amazon case for this product the dimming works OK.  Just close the cover then open it again and it'll adjust to the light.  It won't however adjust dynamically like a cell phone as you move from dark to light or light to dark areas.  Certainly no big deal.
Reviews.Title: Wow

Reviews.Author: A&W320
Reviews.Content: I was not happy when my dog jumped on the couch and broke my Kindle. Then came this deal and i was so excited!!! I am so happy with this purchase! I love to read, play games and surf the web.
Reviews.Title: Great Buy

Reviews.Author: Rebecca Jones
Reviews.Content: The kindle Fire is great.  I think it is hands down better than Apple or Samsung.  I would recommend this tablet to anyone that is looking for something easy and convenient and the size is great not to big or to small.
Reviews.Title: My Shadow

Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle. Its easy to use. I can read my books...surf the web,,get my email and watch  a movie. What more could you ask for??? Oh how about the skins...which I got too and made my  Kindle all Mine.
Reviews.Title: My Kindle

Reviews.Author: muggle
Reviews.Content: the system is not convenience enough,  and the battery go down very quickly, i should have bought an ipad instead.
Reviews.Title: not convenience enough

Reviews.Author: Ray Livengood
Reviews.Content: We have the smaller 7" version as well that my 6 year old son inerrited. What a great device, I love it for the books and periodacles while my son loves the games. For the price, fantastic!
Reviews.Title: Absolutely fantastic!

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Even though the tablet is used, it seems like new. I had a kindle fire (smaller version) and this one is much easier to read books. Love the size.
Reviews.Title: Good tablet

Reviews.Author: Jenni J
Reviews.Content: I was nervous going the refurbished route but thanks to a great deal from Amazon I went for it. Im so glad I did. It arrived in perfect like brand new condition. Super easy to set up and use. No problems whatsoever. Ive recommended it to anyone looking.
Reviews.Title: Excellent device!

Reviews.Author: rintintin
Reviews.Content: This is another replacement, but I love them.  My problem is with the format on the Words with Friends game.  It is not as user-friendly and still  has some bugs.
Reviews.Title: It works great

Reviews.Author: robert rooker
Reviews.Content: Thought twice, but after I got this I love it.  No more Pad envy at my house.  If you can find a refurb Don't pass it up.
Reviews.Title: Best deal on a 8.9"

Reviews.Author: K.C. Love (kclseattle@aol.com)
Reviews.Content: This is the fifth Kindle I have owned: I hate the SIlk browswer, and the entire Web service freezes up constantly, the battery drains so fast, and the touch interface is off most of the time. It's not easy to use or navigate. I will never buy another of these with the crappy browser per-installed again.
Reviews.Title: Wonky

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I had some problems in the beginning connection to my wifi, but the problem was with my wifi... I just wish I would have pruchased one with more than 8GB!
Reviews.Title: Like New

Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: When its working its fine but it has many problem continuously going off line. Having to continuously restarting the wireless process is a drag.
Reviews.Title: Too many problems

Reviews.Author: bryn
Reviews.Content: My eight year old love's his tablet. He loves it so much that he named her Amy and that's what the whole family refers to her as. I think it's pretty much his first girlfriend. It's adorable! Before this he had a nexus and he never named that one!lol
Reviews.Title: Amy is awesome!

Reviews.Author: Lynn Volkl
Reviews.Content: Worked great until it kept heating up and cracked the screen after 10 months.  Supposedly that my fault as you cannot crack the glass without a lot of pressure so they say.  Will not replace with another Kindle. Between my kids and I, this was the 6th device.
Reviews.Title: will not purchase another one.

Reviews.Author: Courtney A. Rose
Reviews.Content: I was having trouble deciding what tablet to purchase and with a limited about of money I decided to go with a refurbished Kindle Fire HD 8.9". A coworker has Kindles for herself and her two songs and they all love them, so I figured why not? It was a great purchase! The screen quality is outstanding and streaming movies/videos is a breeze. I can't wait to sit outside this summer and read. I've recommended the Kindle Fire HD to anyone who I've met looking to purchase a tablet.
Reviews.Title: Love my new Kindle Fire HD!

Reviews.Author: Katrina White "katrina"
Reviews.Content: not happy with it at all doing the same thing the last one did it freezes all the time i soon as i open it in the fist 2 min its frozen !!!! very very up set
Reviews.Title: not happy with it at all doing the same thing the ...

Reviews.Author: Sugarx2
Reviews.Content: This model has NO AUTOMATIC UPLOAD TO THE CLOUD feature, and NO SOFTWARE PATCH to make that happen either! Manual Uploads of Videos and Photos taken with the KINDLE only!  NOTE, my first one broke, and I am reviewing the replacement of the first generation Kindle Fire HD 8.9".  The first original model of this style, never worked properly, and overheated, The keyboard kept changing languages, photos were lost when the first one completely died as it never did automatically go through to the cloud, and they told me it would. The WiFi connection would go down, while my Router looked fine, the different softwares would start and stop, could not manually upload most photos or videos to Facebook.  This new 2nd creation of the same basic model seems much better. I have had it only a few days, but already I see that the photos and videos seem to upload, at least most do, and the SILK doesn't seem to keep cutting off like the old Kindle did. The Kindle Fire HD is getting better. Wish I had waited 18 months from my original purchase- to buy the newer one that just came out with a camera that works front side and selfie side. Mine only has the Selfie side..... {{ I will give the Amazon customer service department FIVE STARS though. They really try hard to get me moving along, and get things fixed! }}
Reviews.Title: No automatic upload to the CLOUD, no software to patch it through either! Manual Uploads only!

Reviews.Author: Jason Smith
Reviews.Content: We really enjoy our Kindle. We primarily use it for reading books, though the internet works well with it. The Kindle Fire works well with textbooks because of how you can zoom in and out. It has a lot of apps, and the ease of use is good. I would recommend getting a case for it, though. Anything like this is fairly fragile.
Reviews.Title: Great Device

Reviews.Author: lynda johnson
Reviews.Content: I charged it with my computer once. It downloaded all my songs to the device and not the cloud, so almost all the memory was gone. You can only delete one song at a time, so it took me four days. The search engine is Bing. You can't change it.  So the first ten or so of the search results are for the UK. Doesn't't help me. I live in Montana.  I was hoping to use the kindle for audio books for myself and my clients. I'm a pediatric home health nurse. Prime doesn't' do audio books and the company that does wants 15 bucks a month, whether you use it or not. The auto correct for spelling also spells words different than you want.  For example, I had to go back and fix the word (paediatric) pediatric twice. I hope to find a way to change the language to American and a way to Google web sites that are actually helpful. May trade my daughter for her tablet. Otherwise, I'll just keep spelling words the old English was and continue the slow process of learning how to use it correctly.
Reviews.Title: still learning it.

Reviews.Author: fantasyreader
Reviews.Content: All of my other electronics (phones, laptops) have no wifi problems. The kindle says I have no internet connection almost every time I turn it on, and I have to go to the wifi menu, and turn wifi off then on again to get it working. It's annoying.The keyboard is not as responsive as my iphone. But for the price I'm still glad I got it.
Reviews.Title: Drops Wifi signal a lot

Reviews.Author: Michelle Sterling
Reviews.Content: My kindle was a gift from my husband. I love it! I love that it's portable. I can use it while outdoors with the grandkids. I also like all the books available. My husband likes that there aren't books stacked all over the house.
Reviews.Title: my kindle

Reviews.Author: Barb Weier
Reviews.Content: The machine is great but I do not like the way you try to drain money from me when it comes to playing games. I have bought games that I cannot play now because I will not buy lives----so I deleted it.
Reviews.Title: KIndle Fire

Reviews.Author: Michael G. Bennett
Reviews.Content: It's the right size and it works quite well.  I wish it also had a built in GPS and motion sensor as I am not able to use it for star locating at night.  Big disappointment.  It is a great device for reading and watching videos.  I'm not a game player and the games I have tried do not satisfy as a laptop, desktop might accomplish.  What it does, it does well.
Reviews.Title: Kindling a Fire

Reviews.Author: M. Naidas
Reviews.Content: Just started to use it but because the transfer of Prime Membership is not transferable I will not purchase another Prime Membership for this product
Reviews.Title: Just started to use it but because the transfer of ...

Reviews.Author: Beverly Payge
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant to buy a refurbished Kindle, but with the deal I got I decided to try it out.  I've had my first generation Kindle Fire and have been happy with it but I wanted more space for more apps and a larger screen.  The 8.9 HD 32 GB had that and it is proving to be a great investment for our family.  It is faster, clearer (HD) and just operates better overall.  I have had a few glitches but they are because of apps, not the Kindle itself.  The apps on this thing are awesome, much better quality-viewing than the smaller, older Kindle Fire we own.  I'm enjoying that we can stock up on apps and aren't in danger of running out of space.I still prefer to read books on the smaller, first generation Kindle Fire because it is more comfortable to hold for longer periods of time and laying down.  I use the 8.9 HD Kindle Fire for email, calendar, web and the apps and occasionally a video (which is pretty much flawless in playback on the 8.9 HD).  It has made my life simpler and more productive to just check my email or the web for something and then put it back down instead of having to sit down at my computer to check email, which usually ends up leading to mindless surfing.One thing I didn't anticipate that would be a real winner was FreeTime, which is a service you can pay monthly for to turn the Kindle into a child's device.  We are finding that it is a winner with our daughter.  She can have her apps and all her favorites in her FreeTime and I like the fact that she can't leave FreeTime without my password and that she can't purchase anything inside of it.
Reviews.Title: Refurbished works like new, no regrets buying!

Reviews.Author: jacinta
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire hd.  It has everything that I was looking for.  My children love to play learning games on it.  The size is perfect for someone that has poor eye sight!
Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Author: Wayne c Jetzer
Reviews.Content: It is a good value at the $129 price.  Unlike the HDX it is unable to connect wirelessly with a TV.  That is a big disappointment.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"

Reviews.Author: Rhonda Wills "Rhonda W."
Reviews.Content: I love love love this device.  I have been reading, watching TV shows, playing games and having a ball.  The thing looks like brand new and performs like it too.  A good decision for sure!
Reviews.Title: This Baby is a Keeper!

Reviews.Author: Dogcatcher
Reviews.Content: Don't buy at full price.  It's not worth it.  Wait for a sale or a refurbished unit under $150.The Kindle Fire HD 8.9 is a decent piece of hardware that is diminished by its user interface.  People who have never used a tablet may not be bothered by the interface, but those familiar with real Android smartphones and tablets are likely to be annoyed by a design that so clearly promotes shopping and consumption of Amazon's digital content.  Yes, I know, the primary purpose of the Kindle is to encourage more purchases from Amazon, but the sales focus is excessive.When you install a free app from Amazon's app store, you receive an e-mail confirmation of your $0.00 purchase.  Overkill.The special offers on the start-up screen are no problem.  They go almost unnoticed among all the other sales pitches.Other observations: -  The 8.9" size is easier to hold in the hand than a 10.1" tablet, and it is lighter. -  The display is sharp, making it easy to see detail on Google maps, for example. -  The dual-band radio is great if you have a dual-band "n" or an "ac" wireless router. -  Works well with Bluetooth Android keyboard. -  No option to use an SD card, because Amazon wants you to use its cloud for storage. -  Short battery life when in active use; keep a charger handy. -  The real Android OS provides many more configuration options than does the simplified Kindle OS.Fortunately, the Kindle Fire's operating system can be replaced.  So, within 48 hours of starting to use the Kindle, I had converted mine to run as a real tablet with Android 4.2.2.  It's a nice Android tablet.  The excellent screen and decent internals make the Kindle a good value if you can get it for less than full price.  Note:  A DIY conversion to Android is technically challenging.  For a conversion that is almost foolproof, and that can be performed by most users, check out the package offered by N2Acards.
Reviews.Title: Do not pay full price

Reviews.Author: D Heller
Reviews.Content: Like new!  Love it! Works great and the images are amazing plus pricing was excellant  i highly recommend this unit
Reviews.Title: Beautiful

Reviews.Author: Robin A. Sipos
Reviews.Content: This really exceeded my expectations.  It was packaged like new, looked like new and is working like new.  Thanks Amazon!
Reviews.Title: Great Bargain

Reviews.Author: P. Dockery
Reviews.Content: It works great my husband has a kindle fire 7" that my 3 year old  grandson has taken over and has it filled with games so when I saw the Certified Refurbished deal I couldn't pass it up for my husband.  It took us a little while to figure it out since it works just a little different to the 7" but they are great.  The 8.9" is a little heavier to hold when reading but I guess that is to be expected with the larger size.  We are a family of three Kindles now and they all are getting used and enjoyed.  Thank you.
Reviews.Title: Works like new.

Reviews.Author: J-Stroke
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet and I chose it primarily because of the low price.  I have been paralyzed by indecision -- there are so many choices -- but the refurbished price plus some Amazon bucks I had accumulated made this a low risk foray in to the world of tablets. I would normally skip a review of this since I try to stick to things I know something about.  But there are two specific observations I have to share.First, my "refurbished" Kindle is as good as new; I can't tell a difference. I am glad I went with one and saved the $70. Second, the screens on these things are extremely reflective, much more so than my smartphone or my notebook which are my only two reference points. I would probably not by another one for this reason alone.
Reviews.Title: As good as new

Reviews.Author: Hope Harrison
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my 75 year old mom and she loves it.  It was everything I expected and more.  I would recommend this to anyone
Reviews.Title: Great Product

Reviews.Author: Bassel M.
Reviews.Content: I thought I will receive a refurbished item which maybe there is something missing from the accessories ...etcBut I received a brand new item with half the price which is amazing
Reviews.Title: excellent

Reviews.Author: Dog Walker
Reviews.Content: Good the first 8 months. Now it takes several attempts to connect to wireless at home even though my I phone and Dell laptop connect immediately and they are older than the kindle. Also touch screen  keyboard does not always work well.
Reviews.Title: wears out quickly

Reviews.Author: tricia walton henson
Reviews.Content: This is my second kindle fire hd and it has been behaving much worse than my first, it continues to shut off while I'm using it. I can't completely read my email, scroll on facebook, or play my game  without it shutting down on me or just freezing. It is really frustrating and have taken the enjoyment of ownership of a tablet out the window. It slow to upload, and I have not been able to post my winnings to Facebook. I cannot successfully do a screenshot whenever I want, this feature most of the time does not work. Ugh! This has become a nightmare
Reviews.Title: second worst than first

Reviews.Author: Pedr021
Reviews.Content: Watching movies and TV shows is very nice on this unit. But as far as the Silk browser, it is very unreliable and crashes a lot. I have a very fast internet connection and I have no issue with my Smartphone, Laptop, Xbox, but as far as using the internet from my Kindle is very slow even after turning off certain features. I got the 32GB physical memory thinking it would help but no. Until Amazon creates a better browsing experience, I will probably not purchase another one.
Reviews.Title: Silk Browser crashes

Reviews.Author: Bobbe Howard
Reviews.Content: Even though I liked the Kindle reader, the additional featured of the Fire make the purchase very worthwhile.  Easy to use.
Reviews.Title: Great to have

Reviews.Author: Barry Metzger
Reviews.Content: I got this Kindle this past Christmas. I was like a school boy. After all I saw all the commercials about it prior to Christmas. They were all trueand I am thrilled with it. I can do anything on it that I can do on my computer, in the palm of my hand. I am a big fan of KINDLE FIRE HD 8.9
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire D 8.9"

Reviews.Author: Sandii
Reviews.Content: I had a Kindle Fire which crapped out and I was offered a discount on this one when getting the Kindle fire replaced.  It was so worth the extra money.  I love the big screen!  I also use it for the internet when my laptop is upstairs when I'm downstairs or visa versa.  There is a tool which will read the words to you although it is a robotic voice,  the text to voice app that I just discovered.  Anyway I think this kindle rocks.  It goes on trips with me and where there is free wi-fi, I can watch netflix or hbogo.
Reviews.Title: Love my kindle!

Reviews.Author: B. JONES "British Invasion Enthusiast"
Reviews.Content: Using this is a hoot!!!!  I love the mobility!  I don't have an I-phone and this is just the right size to stick into my purse.  I'm addicted!
Reviews.Title: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!!

Reviews.Author: Ian
Reviews.Content: I ordered this mostly as a full-color e-reader for work, as well as being able to get online and use a few apps.  I would say that it gets light use - downloading books from Amazon and PDFs from my computer, and installing Adobe Reader and Rosetta Stone.  I also use it to watch Amazon Prime on occasion.However, I am currently on my 4th replacement in less than a year.  I will be using the kindle and it will turn off randomly (goes to standby, not power down).  It will then turn back on after a few seconds back to the lock screen.  Sometimes it does it once, sometimes several times in a row.  It does it on a full charge.  It does it right out of the box after having all my books and apps reinstalled without much other use.  It will do it in the middle of a prime video, even while plugged in.No one at Amazon has been able to figure anything out, and the only solution is to keep sending me a new one.  I have seen a few other people describe this same problem, so I know that it isn't just something I am doing.  I'd love to replace it with a completely different product, or just know what the problem is and have it fixed.
Reviews.Title: Constant problems with very little use

Reviews.Author: jjknodel14
Reviews.Content: I've had my kindle for one month.  I originally bought it for a trip for the plane ride.  My up volume has already quit working. This is very frustrating for only having it for such a short time. I have owned a fee other kindle s and never had any issues
Reviews.Title: good tablet, didnt last

Reviews.Author: Cory
Reviews.Content: I was replacing an original iPad and decided on a Kindle Fire. It failed in every way. The first one would not charge and was replaced. The second one takes about 36 hours to reach 90% charged and only about 12 hours to return to 0% even if I'm not using it much.But how does it perform?  Horribly. The built in Silk Browser for the internet freezes then crashes every 15 minutes or so. The apps available are meager. I added a few magazine subscriptions, but each time there's a new issue it has forgotten about my subscription and I have to go through the whole process again. Even when it knows I'm subscribed it always looks like they're about to charge me for the issue. YouTube videos are either the size of a business card or have the comments superimposed over half the video.The Kindle Lending Library available with Prime offers thousands of books to borrow, none of which you would ever want to borrow. I was upset when I found out I could only borrow one book per month, even if I finished it earlier. Then I realized that wasn't such a problem since I honestly couldn't find two books I wanted to borrow from the selection available.Reading a book on the Kindle is a decent experience. You can select any word and it gives you the definition. That is the nicest thing I can say about the whole device.I guess it balances out - the battery doesn't last, it crashes constantly, but it doesn't have any content I want to use, so it just sits on my coffee table. I don't know if it's charged. But it's a safe bet that it's not.
Reviews.Title: Should've Just Bought Some Books

Reviews.Author: Helen Leach
Reviews.Content: Its my first  of its kind and I'm having a very good time learning what all is available to me.  It works on WIFI so anywhere it is available the kindle works well.  Took it on vacation a week after receiving it and all the motels offered a connection plus it was good to have at the airport while waiting for the next boarding.  I put the HCSB Study Bible on it and have the WORD with me wherever I go. (Easier than carrying the Book) I enjoy having so many free things to download. The games are fun and challenging.  It is so much lighter weight than a computer would be and getting my email is a great feature.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9

Reviews.Author: A Reader "retired scientist"
Reviews.Content: My wife recently had a stroke which affected her vision. She was an avid reader, but now she couldn't read; therefore, I bought this Kindle for her and joined an audible book club for her. She loves it and listens to it every day.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD

Reviews.Author: Jo B
Reviews.Content: I have been a Kindle Fire supporter since the beginning This is my 4th Kindle Fire device. However, for what ever reason this product is performing very poorly. I have to shut it completely down to get to unlock. It will not keep time and does not hold a charge for very long. I am way past my 30 day return date and I am disappointed that I can not return it. I m not sure t can be repaired. If someone had posted the poor quality of this device, I would not have purchased it, especially the 32 GB version.
Reviews.Title: VERY DISAPPOINTED

Reviews.Author: Clifford M. Graham
Reviews.Content: I needed a tablet for versatility and to take wear and tear off of my laptop. I also wanted  something that was easier to use in bed and  maneuver  around the house with..  Books, music, videos, Email the Kindle does all it was supposed to do .turning off the wireless extends my battery life(I also got the quick AC charger)  No sense of buyer remorse
Reviews.Title: My HD Fire

Reviews.Author: A. Jones
Reviews.Content: I wish I had purchased any other tablet.  When this works it is great - I would say at least 50-60% of the time it freezes while loading even short videos - I have to shut down and bring it up, again.  Don't waste your hard earned money.
Reviews.Title: I hate SILK Browser

Reviews.Author: Marcia K.
Reviews.Content: The color is great. The keyboard sticks quite often. I'll be typing and it keeps going to uppercase. The most annoying thing is the freezing up. So many times I will be doing something and it stops, I can't go anywhere or even power down. I have an IPad and tend to use that more just because of that.
Reviews.Title: Not as good as expected

Reviews.Author: Regina Fromhold
Reviews.Content: If is all right but I find the larger size clumsy. I really do not like all the ads that come up when I turn it on
Reviews.Title: Fair

Reviews.Author: Shannon McCarrick
Reviews.Content: I had a Kindle touch that I loved and was Leary about going with a tablet version because of the backlight. I'm glad I did.I wanted a reader more than a tablet and that's why I went with this over any other tablet. I did a lot of research between this and the Nook HD+ before my purchase. My daughters both have a nook HD so I knew the specs. I love the kindle way better.Screen is a no e so,e and video display and playback is excellent. The speakers could be better and a little louder but that's my only complaint there.As a reader,I love it. I have to turn the brightness down a lot when I read so I am glad it has a wide range to choose from. Pages flow nicely, and even the text to speech doesn't sound too robotic.Side loading is no problem and super easy, where the Nook is not. I don't even miss not having the playstore. Amazon's app selection can be limited but not as much as some reviews will have you think, and most things you can get for free.I love the storage space. Internet browsing is fast. Everything runs smoothly.I don't leave my house without it, and I pretty much use it for everything,  work, email, reading, browsing, shopping, finances, you name it.I'm extremely happy I made the decision vision to go with this reader and will continue to stick with kindle in the future.
Reviews.Title: One of my favorite things

Reviews.Author: Helen H Morrell
Reviews.Content: I have not been able to explore as much as I would like as I have been ill  but it is more than I expected.  I would like to purchase stand and keep board as I am disabled and I have only partial use of right hand and damage due to RA so hard to hold.Amazon service is top notch!  They really impressed me and will purchase more from them in future.
Reviews.Title: Great tablet.  Forget reader, you get so much for your $$$

Reviews.Author: Tanya54
Reviews.Content: The black strip gets very hott do it suppose to get hottt I had called before but I was just wondering
Reviews.Title: kindlie fire

Reviews.Author: My Subconscious Self "Charles"
Reviews.Content: I'm unhappy with this Kindle I have. Can't even figure out the actual model name or number. My BIG complaints are 1: No manual!!! Jeesh!  2: No slot for memory card. After having lost and/or accidentally broken a few previous tablets, I don't like the restriction on being able to keep my data, books, pictures, videos, or whatever stores on a micro-SD card so that if lost or stolen, nobody has access to what I have on this Kindle. Since there is no manual, how can one learn much about it? If you have pictures on this thing, and you later decide to delete any and do delete them, thumbnails still exist in the memory. Privacy is lost. Same thing with storing .pdf files. Like Windows, software writers are determined that hackers (including law and government) can access your data, like it or not. I SO want to go back to a color Nook. I'm disgusted with this thing.
Reviews.Title: Quite unhappy with this thing

Reviews.Author: Brandon Miller
Reviews.Content: I really love the hardware - screen resolution, size, sound, etc. But I could NOT get past that horrible and LIMITED Amazon ecosystem / user interface. Apps are very limited compared to stock Android. Very limited customization as well. I swapped it for a Galaxy Tab 8" and am loving it.
Reviews.Title: Great hardware, horrible software / U.I.

Reviews.Author: Syed Moin
Reviews.Content: I received a Certified Refurbished Kindle Fire HD 8.9" and was absolutely surprised by the quality of product. It's as good as new.Would have given 5 stars but for the lack of support for downloading apps from Amazon appstore outside of US.Overall, a great product. I'm impressed!
Reviews.Title: Too good to be called refurbished

Reviews.Author: Sheila winch
Reviews.Content: Great screen resolution but I play a lot on it. Battery life sucks.  Otherwise good product  Has basically the same games I play on iPad.
Reviews.Title: Product is midline

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: If you are planning on reading or using this for known kindle apps it's a good device. Using as a browser is not recommended.
Reviews.Title: Good for reading and some apps but NOT for browsing

Reviews.Author: Richie Pena
Reviews.Content: My tablet experience began with this one. I didn't really know much and had never handled tablets. When I got this kindle I was so excited I couldn't contain myself. In regards to movie watching and navigating the amazon store it was INCREDIBLE... It exceeded my expectations. The problem came when you were navigating something that wasn't amazon related.... That was a mess! It was slow and clunky. The web browser... I don't even think I can call it that... What a pain. It was hard to use and extremely slow. At first I attributed it to tablets being new etc. etc. I later quickly came to find out when I played with someone else's "comparable" iPad that my product was not the best. The iPad in regards to movie watching was not the best, in that regards the kindle was better. In everything else the iPad won.
Reviews.Title: Superior movie quality... Everything else?

Reviews.Author: CVV
Reviews.Content: I thought about getting a iPad but my wife and I tend to buy a lot of things thru amazon this an excellent buy. I am using it right now to write this review.I also purchased the prime package.no way I could of got this deal with the ipad.
Reviews.Title: excellent

Reviews.Author: IanO "Music is the food of life....."
Reviews.Content: I generally like amazon own brand products, and I love Android, and I love using a tablet...so the thought of a super cheap refurbished Kindle HD seemed like a no-brainer. I even bought the screen protector, and a keyboard/case at the same time.Imagine my disappointment when I found the tablet was slow overall, and the Silk browser kept crashing multiple times a day. In the end, the internet experience was so glitchy I returned the Fire...BTW, I was additionally disappointed to find that it was not made easy to use an alternative browser than the Silk browser - there are ways to download the install package of an alternative and just install it - I actually tried that with the Dolphin browser (which I have used on other tablets many times), but even that would not work properly i.e. it would crash super quickly.I know many people have used the Kindle Fire tablets without issue, and maybe I just got a bad one (it was refurbished after all), and maybe getting the newer an faster HDX model would have been better anyway. In the end, the experience with this one was my excuse to buy a Samsung Galaxy pro 12.2 model...several times as much as this refurbished Kindle, so not a fair comparison of course. It has worked flawlessly...and I do not regret that choice.
Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle Fire - browser crashing, and a little slow in general

Reviews.Author: Alexis
Reviews.Content: I bought this kindle in 2012 right when it came about. It worked fast, easy reading, nice for younger kids and teens, up to date apps, and nice way to Skype. I used this a lot and bought a 1 year warranty with it. I took this on vacations to the beach to read on a nice, warm, and bright sunny day. Plus the long car rides to Portland, Seattle, San Francisco, Yellowstone, San Diego or even just to the Oregon Coast. Also it worked great for book reports with the definition dictionary on E-Books and Audibles . Then... 1 year and 3 months later . It stopped working . I could not charge it pass 1% and when it reached 1% it would go back to 0% and shut down. It would stay on 1% for 30 minutes and then turn off . During those 30 minutes I looked for a social media app called Instagram quite a couple of times and all they have is a Kindle Client where you can't post any pictures. Also my speaker on the left side has blown out.  Before I had the kindle fire I had a regular Kindle. This Kindle had a keyboard and 3G wireless. The 3G was really nice when my family and I went camping or even on vacations. I had this Kindle for a year and then all of a sudden it would not take off a screen that said "Please charge Kindle" with an empty battery. I charged it a week without taking it off and the screen would still not come off of it.  I'm starting to ask myself before buying another Kindle "Do I really want to take the risk of all these problems again?" So goodbye Kindle. Hello Apple and Windows.
Reviews.Title: Worked great! For awhile...

Reviews.Author: Eddy
Reviews.Content: I have had the Kindle Fire HD for a little over a year now.  It was great for the first year but since the one year mark it has been going down hill from there.  The browser "Silk" is horrible!  It is very slow and freezes up constantly.  I can't read any news articles or even get on the internet that it doesn't freeze up and I have to shut it completely down.  The Kindle email won't delete some emails and I have to delete them several times before they are actually deleted. I contacted Amazon about the problems I was having and of course I never heard back from them.  I have been an Amazon user for many years, but I guess that doesn't matter.  I would not recommend this product with the problems that I have had with it and the lack of tech support. For the price it should last longer than just a year.  I am very disappointed in this product and Amazon.
Reviews.Title: RE:  Update On Kindle Fire HD 8.9"

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased as a Valentine's gift for my husband when it was on sale. He watches you tube and prime instant video a lot. The HD is wonderful. He thoroughly enjoyed this upgrade from the original Kindle Fire as he does not use an ipad or anything else comparable.
Reviews.Title: purchased for husband

Reviews.Author: Cindy Feldsine
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire. It is perfect for me. I take it everywhere. I read, play games and watch netflix on it.
Reviews.Title: Perfect for me

Reviews.Author: Maisie
Reviews.Content: Other than a laptop and a basic cell phone, I was not much interested a Kindle or any other device.  That was until Amazon ran the special on the refurbished  Kindle HD for $129.00 with the warranty.I've always been rather vexed when having to deal with  new technology written in eight languages and hard to figure out how to use.I read every review I found and ended up taking the plunge.  I'm not sorry I did.  This Kindle was worth every penny.  Was not that hard to learn to use, I even enjoy reading on it, which surprised me,  viewing Prime shows and movies has been a delight.  It has been an enjoyable experience learning what my Kindle can do.  I will be writing an update when I use the HDMI cable I purchased to view movies on TV.Happy Kindling!
Reviews.Title: My first device

Reviews.Author: Jackie DiGiovanni
Reviews.Content: It's rarely out of my hands - great tablet for pretty much anything I need. Got it specifically for Kindle books, but also play a lot of games and access all my regular haunts - Pinterest, Facebook, etc. without any problems. Highly recommend.
Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC

Reviews.Author: Judith B.
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MY KINDLE HD 8.9.I WORK NIGHT SHIFT AT  ST. LUKES HOSPICE HOUSE,WHEN THINGS ARE QUEIT,I'LL GO ON MY KINDLE TO READ OR PLAY GAMES HELP'S THE NIGHT GO FAST,I ALSO USE IT ALOT AT HOME WHEN NOTHING ON TV,I'LL WATCH MOVIES .I WOULD LIKE TO SIGN UP FOR THE AMAZON MOVIES ON THE KINDLE ,SO I GIVE IT 5 STARS.
Reviews.Title: LOVE MY KINDLE

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "jumpnjoey"
Reviews.Content: I spent a lot of time waiting for appointments.  With the Kindle I can borrow books and magazines to help pass the time.  The picture and sound quality if very good.
Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Already have the 7 inch kindle but not the HD.  Was thinking if we really need another.  Well , I can say, we are happy with this purchase.  Beautiful 8.9 screen.  Sound wows you.  We love it.
Reviews.Title: Oh, so nice.

Reviews.Author: DanznPisces
Reviews.Content: Mom loves her Kindle Fire! She lives in a small trailer and needed a way to order certain items since she lives so far away from the nearest store. She doesn't have room for a desktop computer. I bought this for her. She had a hard time using her phone surfing the web with her limited eyesight-AND since some tablets were so pricey, we opted for the Kindle Fire! She has been using it from day one!
Reviews.Title: Mom loves her Kindle Fire!

Reviews.Author: Jennifer Whelpley
Reviews.Content: Love it!  I use  my kindle 90% of the time.  The price is good, which makes it even a better product.
Reviews.Title: great product

Reviews.Author: Martin Gartenberg
Reviews.Content: This has a flaw in that if it is placed in a protective case that flips open it will automatically come on and stay on when the case cover is flipped open using power, even when I turn the tablet off it will remain on as long as the cover is closed. Someware in the tablet there must be some sort of a magnet that turns on the tablet when the cover is opened. This shortens the battery life so I am unable to watch more then two movies with a total time of about four hours or less before it needs to be charged again. The only alternative that I have is to leave the cover of the case always open then it will retain the battery power but then it is exposed to everything and defeats the purpose of using the protective case. This is my only gripe and everything about it is working well. If I had to do it all over again I would have purchased a mini laptop instead.
Reviews.Title: Protective case and battery power time

Reviews.Author: Jennifer W.
Reviews.Content: I have no complaints about the item, it has a nice size screen for my kiddo to see easily (as well as myself:).  The only hard part is my kids keep finding apps on my iPad that aren't offered through amazon so I find them wanting the iPad all the time instead of their kindle.  Other than that, the tablet has been good so far.
Reviews.Title: Decent tablet

Reviews.Author: Nigel Collins
Reviews.Content: I thought it was me or the apps. But after returning the first device and receiving a new one it does exactly the same! i.e. Skype app works fine initially and after 10-15mins will suddenly lock-up the device with a black screen. I also had this with the camera app. Returned it now for a full refund and will look at other tablets.
Reviews.Title: Camera constantly freezes the device.

Reviews.Author: Butchboy
Reviews.Content: I saw this on sale at Amazon for $139 and I couldn't pass it up. I was looking for a tablet that is larger than 7" so I more easily  read and watch a bit of Netflix. In my old age, my eyes aren't what they used to be so a larger screen helps.  The 8.9" kindle fits that bill perfectly.  Not too big and not too small. Being refurbished didn't bother me since it still came with the same warranty and Amazon is very good about standing behind their products.I got the package from Amazon before it was promised. It included a USB cable and nothing else. If you want to charge the tablet in wall outlet, you'd have to use your own standard USB charger or purchase another one. It doesn't come with any manual, but the Kindle OS is very intuitive and easy to use.If you use the kindle for reading, Netflix or other light duty apps, the kindle will serve you well. I also have a Nexus 7 (1st gen) and the Nexus is a bit peppier than the Kindle, but not by much. Plus the Kindle's screen is far superior to my Nexus 7. The Kindle OS is very easy to navigate although a bit cluttered IMHO.  The "Special Offers" are basically advertisements on the lock screen. They are not intrusive at all and sometimes the offers are quite compelling.I wanted to install apps that are only available in Google Play and not available in the Amazon apps store. I therefore rooted the Kindle and modded it to a generic Android KitKat tablet.  It is working just great and I can now install and run apps from Google Play and the Amazon Appstore. I installed the Kindle app from Google play, so I didn't lose any functionality by rooting.Overall, I am very happy with the Kindle purchase, especially at the price I got it at.
Reviews.Title: Great Price for a Fine Tablet

Reviews.Author: Vivette Webb
Reviews.Content: I was kinda disappointed with the Kindle because I thought I would be be able to get more games on it.Try to get that situated and I will be happy.
Reviews.Title: It's OK

Reviews.Author: Carol Shattuck
Reviews.Content: On my replacement as the original kept freezing up,jumping from one app to another. Tried all the possible fixes as was suggested. Nothing helped. This device is doing the same thing but not quite as bad. Hate to have to send this one back too.
Reviews.Title: Having buyers remorse.

Reviews.Author: DRC
Reviews.Content: The video quality is excellent on the Kindle. I bought a 25 feet HDMI cable and use it to watch TV shows I missed. This has had mixed results. I watched one show and the video on my TV was crystal clear. A couple days later, I watched another show from the same network and it the video was bad. The browser that comes with the Kindle is not very user friendly. And since Adobe will not allow Kindle to use flash, Kindle has an experimental way of viewing the shows via the cloud. It can be challenging to get a TV show to play to say the least. There are some really cool apps. But they are somewhat limited. Since Kindle is so proprietary and Google is a competitor, you miss out on a lot of apps. Kindle try to keep you locked into the Amazon world. Yes there are hacks to get around some of that, but not something the average person wants to mess with. I bought this for my wife and she loves it for playing games on it. Not sure it is something I would buy for my self.
Reviews.Title: Overall Like It

Reviews.Author: BarbA
Reviews.Content: This is actually my second 8.9" Kindle.  My first one got to the point where it did not hold a charge well, and Amazon replaced it with this new one.  The sound on this one is better and louder than the old one!  I use this every day, and very seldom use my desktop PC anymore, as the Kindle does about anything I need to do online, and I love the free and low cost books.  I can't imagine being without a Kindle,  Amazon shipped the new one very fast, and after I received it, I shipped the old one back to them.  So, I did not have to go a single day without one.  GREAT Customer Service, Amazon!!
Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle!

Reviews.Author: regina
Reviews.Content: i think kindle is top in the line of ereaders or tablets, I have the ipads & samsung & the 7"  &  8.9" kindle fire  hd &i; just want to say i would be hard pressed if i had to chose between the ipad & the kindles,plus amazon is the best support you could ask for,if you have a problem they are there to back up there product & help you any way they can. Really I rate kindle higher than 5 star.
Reviews.Title: love kindle everything!!!

Reviews.Author: Kathy A. Gray
Reviews.Content: The title really says it all. If you are concerned about getting bombarded with ads, you can tweak it so  you only get the one when you first log on.
Reviews.Title: My fourth Kindle

Reviews.Author: Marilyn Publicover
Reviews.Content: I also ordered the cover that didn't even begin to fit. No charger included. We had to take the time to to Wal-Mart to get the needed  supplies. Being handicapped makes it difficult.
Reviews.Title: kindle great, cover useless

Reviews.Author: thomas valkenet
Reviews.Content: Kindle is a great reader. But it is a horrible internet browser. Silk is just bad. It freezes so much I am nervous every time I make an election to move on or from a page. My fingers have freezer burn! I am saving for an Apple product.
Reviews.Title: falls short

Reviews.Author: Cynthia Benningfield
Reviews.Content: I like the size, the HD, I HATE, HATE, HATE, HATE, HATE Silk Browser!!! It locks up and freezes every 2 minutes! I was happier with my Kindle Fire 7"
Reviews.Title: Hate Silk Browser!

Reviews.Author: carol
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MY NEW KINDLE. IT IS SO EASY TO NAVIGATE. AMAZON'SCUSTOMER SERVIVE IS BY FAR THE BEST SERVICE I HAVEENCOUNTERED IN VERY LONG TIME.
Reviews.Title: wow! What fun and easy operation.

Reviews.Author: Don Bookworm
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD 8.9 is the perfect size for me and has amazing versatility.  I am only beginning to tap its many uses but already know that it far surpasses any device that I have had for daily, multiple usage.  I love the carousel presentation of books, programs and services.
Reviews.Title: Perfect for my needs

Reviews.Author: Victor Pritchett
Reviews.Content: Don't really know what the specials are. Hard to navigate. Does this device have a camera if so where is it?
Reviews.Title: Not easy to navigate

Reviews.Author: David Nowak
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product as a gift, and from what i am hearing and getting nothing but praises.  They are extremely pleased with it.  The only problems experienced were no instruction booklet comes with it, so we looked it up on line.  The camera only allows you to take selfies, unless you are agile enough to take pictures from behind your head.  But all in all she is happy with how it performs and how easy it is to operate, including purchasing new books.  I would recommend this to others.
Reviews.Title: Great Product

Reviews.Author: Daniel Murray
Reviews.Content: I like my Kindle overall, but find myself spending much time getting around walls to download apps available from google, but not amazon.
Reviews.Title: Great video quality, app limitations

Reviews.Author: "By_George"
Reviews.Content: I have had my new Kindle Fire HD for about a week now and I love it.  It is packed with entertainment...the Dual Band Wi-Fi is excellent.  I have added about a dozen hot spot locations to my device and my device connects quickly and offers excellent streaming of content.  The picture quality is nice and bright and crisp, the dolby audio and speaker positions on the Kindle is also excellent.  I bought this device on Valentine's Day for myself.  It was normally $299 and amazon was offering $80 off.  This was the best discount I had seen on amazon so I took the plunge and I have been in love ever since.  I have downloaded more than 25 apps already.  My favorite is the CW app (fantastic) ... Since this channel has over half of my favorite shows:  Arrow, Beauty and the Beast, Supernatural, and the Vampire Diaries.  The Nightly News and CNN app keep me up to date on current events and the Weather Channel app offers a quick look at the forcast for the week.  I cant rave enough about my tablet.  Why spend $500 or more on a smart phone.  Get a tablet.  It is a much better value.
Reviews.Title: Entertainment Powerhouse - Love it.

Reviews.Author: Thomas A. Baxter
Reviews.Content: I like the Kindle when it works, but I am on my 5th Kindle because of charging issues.  I thought that I was over charging them so I reduced the time of charging.  That didn't work either, the Kindles have not lasted more than one charging before going completely dead.  Amazon has a real problem with this issue that needs to be addressed ASAP.  I have many books that need to be read but the Kindles aren't up to it.
Reviews.Title: charging issues

Reviews.Author: tulipsandy
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my Mom who has macular degeneration.  She was hoping to play card games.  The game portion is great, it's the buttons at the bottom that are so tiny and close together, she couldn't manage those buttons.  It seemed to me, Kindle could have made them bigger and farther apart.  Even the TIME on top is very tiny.  She still has her Kindle Paperwhite for reading and I am able to adjust font bigger so she can read.  Very disappointed and I am returning.
Reviews.Title: Not Elder Friendly

Reviews.Author: Shelley R. Blumstein
Reviews.Content: This is a replacement Kindle. The battery on the first one was defective in 6 months. Amazon replaced the Kindle with one that did not have the updated software mine did. I wasted four hours of my time in the store where I bought it, because Kindle Support told me to reboot the Kindle, and then to register it to solve my problem. If it were not for the alert employee in the store who saw the software issue, I still would not know what was the issue. I would never buy a Kindle again, because Kindle Support does not know its product. Next time I will buy an Apple I-Pad so I can go straight to the Apple store.
Reviews.Title: Review of Kindle HD 8.9

Reviews.Author: Nancy Taylor
Reviews.Content: I purchased my Kindle 6 months ago & I now feel that I can write an adequate review, for I've finally had enough time to learn all the good & bad about it! On the plus side, it's lightweight and I find myself using it to look things up far more than I ever did with my notebook pc because of it's portability! The carousel on the homepage lets you keep whichever of your apps that you use the most readily available.While there are many other features that I like, I feel that if I was reading a product review, I'd be looking for the downside of it when making my decision as to whether or not to purchase it. First off, I found that Amazon makes a good portion of their money by charging for EVERYTHING! I was immediately annoyed to see that no direct electrical outlet charger was included with it! Instead, it came with one that charges through my pc & takes 5x longer...but you can always purchase the better one at the Amazon store, which your Kindle has a direct link to on it's homepage! The same holds true for the case ($50.), screen protector (I found this necessary due to all the fingerprints left on the screen no matter HOW much I washed my hands before touching it!) & stylus. But one of my most important discoveries which would have affected my decision to purchase the Kindle was something I only learned quite recently: you CANNOT USE ANYONE ELSE'S APPS W/O MAKING AN ADJUSTMENT WHICH VOIDS YOUR WARRANTY!!! I believe that this one item is probably something that anyone considering purchasing a Kindle should first be aware of before buying! This is the one thing which would've had me looking for a different tablet! Other than that, I am happy w/my purchase & I've learned so much from using it.
Reviews.Title: A good product, other than a few important items

Reviews.Author: Ana Helena
Reviews.Content: Is like having an iPad with the benefit on having any book you like!! I recommend the readers that are looking something that allows us to read and surfing on the internet, watch movies, to play games etc.
Reviews.Title: Is perfect!!

Reviews.Author: O N Wascom
Reviews.Content: I have a first generation generation Kindle, 7", I love this larger screen and HD! Got it on sale for Valentine's Day, VERY happy with it!
Reviews.Title: Kindle HD

Reviews.Author: camotim
Reviews.Content: This devise replaced my 7" Kindle Fire which I loved; I needed a larger viewing screen, which the 8.9" Kindle Fire offers; very remarkable devise
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 8.9"

Reviews.Author: Heidi
Reviews.Content: I stream movies through Amazon Prime so the bigger screen is great!  I started with the 7" Fire and upgraded.  Amazon took my old one in on trade and made me a great deal on this one!!
Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Author: Jim P
Reviews.Content: Let me start by explaining that I don't yet own one of these. I have played with them at the store and love it. I'm writing for a different reason. Two hours ago this Kindle was listed on sale for $189.00, this piqued my interest immediately but I decided to think about it. Fast forward two hours....the price...$229.00. The moral of this story is don't hesitate, obviously prices can change without notice. After kicking myself in the ass I am now sitting here contemplating the purchase again, this time for the $229.00 price. Just trying to help my fellow buyer.
Reviews.Title: Sales

Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: great deal great product! thank you!very prompt  deliverybla bla bla blahow many more words ????bye bye bye
Reviews.Title: awesome thanks

Reviews.Author: kathleen m kraus
Reviews.Content: I love it.i already wrote this under the onynx standing case. i loved that as well, lets your hands feel free instead of holding it up.love the kindle itself can do so much with it. play my favorite games, read  articles.
Reviews.Title: kindle fire HD  8.9"

Reviews.Author: John C.
Reviews.Content: For those who are not visually impaired to the extent that I am this machine is great but because it did not have a screen reader I could not use it.  I sent it back and ordered a 7 inch HDX which does have a screen reader and I love it.  I wish I could have afforded to get the 8.9 inch model however but my income does not allow for that at this time.  john C
Reviews.Title: No Screen reader

Reviews.Author: Roselle Harney "WSMer"
Reviews.Content: When my 1st edition Kindle would not take a charge, I was offered a discount on the 8.9 HD kindle.  I didn't have the funds at the time and waited.  When I was able to get the kindle it was no longer a new one but refurbished.  I was skeptical but Amazon gave me a $20 credit to go with it, and I was able to get a case for it.  It looked brand new, and so far has worked like a charm without any problems.  I love the bigger screen and the perks of the HD. It still comes with a one year warranty and Amazon has always been great about their warranties.  So I am very pleased with this kindle.
Reviews.Title: So far great

Reviews.Author: griffin
Reviews.Content: I have looked at other and this is better than most, so much to do, I sometime forget to charge! (my bad) Works for me to read, learning how to look at my pictures, need more help on bringing them to my kindle, but I'll get there, and the wifi option is great!!
Reviews.Title: Nice to bring with me

Reviews.Author: Ameenah I. Luqmaan
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD 8.9 is great.  Just the right size, it stores all Apps, games and books.  Plus, you can't beat the price, which is lower than iPad.  However, in my opinion there are 2 areas that need improvement.  1) Camera to face both directions; 2) The ability to use my photos as screen savers on the Kindle Fire HD 8.9.
Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT!!!

Reviews.Author: Joyce A Hendlowitch
Reviews.Content: You really can't beat it for the price.  I would love it even more if it didn't have the ads showing all the time.  And I would also love  it more if when it  shows deals good only for a limited time that you could actually access them easily.  It is fun to play  with and I'm still leaning how to access all the information about how to use it.  It is a  cool item and I have no problems with it being refurbished at all.
Reviews.Title: Very Happy With It

Reviews.Author: Debbie Schell
Reviews.Content: I really than like it.The only criticism I have is the silk browser sometimes freezes.  Has been very easy to figure out (I am not technically savy).
Reviews.Title: Overall.very good

Reviews.Author: Cincinnati Shopper
Reviews.Content: I'm really enjoying my new Kindle.  Still learning though.  I wish it would have come with more user info though.  I guess I'll pick up a "Kindel for Dummies" book.
Reviews.Title: Love it!

Reviews.Author: Noreen
Reviews.Content: I thought I would never give up reading paper books, but I was hooked from the first moment I used my kindle.  I purchased a cover for it that has a band that I can slip my hand into, so it makes reading while lying down so simple--no pages flipping all over!  Love being able to access the internet if I have access to WiFi.  Just a neat little gadget and so portable!  Just one problem--I read through so many books now and it is SOOOO easy to purchase another one!  TOOOO easy!  :)
Reviews.Title: Love, Love, Love My Kindle!

Reviews.Author: darlene
Reviews.Content: I choose the 8.9 size because to me the other size was too small. It makes it easier for me to read my books, than having to read them on the computer. Plus I can do other things on here while someone else is using my computer. There is one draw back I wish that they would fix. I wish that they would come up with a chat program that would work on it.
Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT!!!!!!

Reviews.Author: Margie
Reviews.Content: It looked and performed like New . The power port was the only portion that shows wear. The battery life is lacking. My grandchildren are frustrated by the lack of memory to store videos for air flights. The streaming video functions are fine but show no improvement over the fire. I still would like a rear facing camera. I have to successfully save a video. Photographs are difficult.
Reviews.Title: great color and sound

Reviews.Author: Lana Deluca
Reviews.Content: I bought two of them for my granddaughters.  They love them.  Now I have to get one for myself.  So many things to do with them.
Reviews.Title: love it

Reviews.Author: Glenda
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my husband for his birthday. And he is loving it! The price was awesome, so I could not resist.He has been wanting one for years. Thank you for all of your help in getting him started. You have never let me down.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire

Reviews.Author: Judy weathers
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied I also have an iPad2 and I think it gives the iPad a run for its money. I am thinking about buying one for my other daughter.
Reviews.Title: Can't get enough of.

Reviews.Author: lulu
Reviews.Content: This new Kindle Fire HD 8.9" has bright, sharp color and outstanding sound. I am so happy with my purchase.
Reviews.Title: Big stepup from my Kindle Fire 7"

Reviews.Author: Mrs Greinke "Joanne"
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of these for myself a few months ago and I love it. I purchased a second one for my husband when he sold his original Kindle (e-reader only) and the Samsung tablet that he has is now used primarily at work. This awesome 8.9" HD Kindle Fire is a tablet and a reader with so many extra features. I know that I've only tapped into a small portion of what it can do but look forward to continuing to learn more about it and all of the cool stuff that it does. An added bonus...it's much more affordable than an IPad at a starting price of $249.00. Amazon frequently has specials on their Kindles. Check back frequently because you never know when they'll be available at a discounted price.
Reviews.Title: Gorgeous HD and much more affordable than an IPad

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Wanting in some critical areas.Specifically the app store and Internet access. Bought this awhile ago and after using it for a few months I found it is a good reader and decent for watching movies but the more I used it I found it extremely weak for internet use and the availability of some basic apps.I got to revisit this relatively inadequate device for more advanced operations after looking my Note 8.0. Like moving from a Jag to a Yugo.What I don't known is whether the internet issue is related to the POS Silk app for browsing. It constantly freezes and  with every click.The app store has no other web browser available. You now realize that even though it acts like a droid it is more locked down than Apple.Don't buy. There are lots of better tabs out there.
Reviews.Title: Needs help

Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: Found nothing in package to help or aid an unknowlegeable user into the use of this item.It is not the easiest Pad to use without the smplified instructions included. Shoud have included a user manual
Reviews.Title: Lacking proper instructions for its usage

Reviews.Author: sonflower
Reviews.Content: I"m disappointed with this item. The battery life is not nearly as long as specified. I have troule getting e-mails and had to restart this several times. I even had to send one back and get another one only to encounter the same issues. If youre just going to use this to read it's fine. If I would have known I would have purchased a different device.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 8.9"

Reviews.Author: Orthel Grapine
Reviews.Content: I have found this kindle hd to be rather slow,  it freezes a lot, it gets hot during usage . Another fact is that all my digital games items that I bought have not transferred to this kindle. Will be contacting customer support
Reviews.Title: KindlefireHD 8.9

Reviews.Author: Oren
Reviews.Content: The tablet looks beautiful; its slim, light, fast and the display is very bright and sharp. However, ive you've ever used another android device, this thing is going to make you really mad. Its impossible to access the google play store without rooting it, which can eaisly brick the device, rendering it completely useless untill you send it in. There is just way too much available on google play for Amazon to just block it on a device that would be perfect for it. There are a couple other apps that do work for searching/installing new apps without using Amazons app store, which is the only reason I didnt return it. So far about 90% of the apps that Amazon charges for are legaly available for free elsewhere.... The default "carousel" home screen is awkward and clunky. There are some other options out there, but you can never completely get rid of the horrid home screen. You also have to pay Amazon if you want the advertisements to be taken off your lock screen.... Yes, even after you BUY it, you are still forced to view ads unless you give them even more money.In hindsight, I really wish I would have bought a different, un-crippled android tablet. However if you are already an Amazon prime member, and do a lot of reading, then this could be a good tablet for you. Personally, I will probably never buy another Amazon tablet, at least untill they quit trying to force you to use only their store.
Reviews.Title: Looks great, purposely crippled for some reason though....

Reviews.Author: Gary Barclay
Reviews.Content: Heavier then expected and not user friendly at startup.  We do not have one of those fancy do everything cell phones so our learning curve isn't the best.  Just needs a little getting use to.  My wife is very happy reading downloaded books at night in bed, and I'm happy to be able to go to sleep with the overhead light off.
Reviews.Title: This is our first tablet.

Reviews.Author: Michael B. Garcia
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my mom to use her email.. it turned out to take too many steps for her.. I wish it had gps.. it doesn't.. the screen is large and nice.. it does NOT come with a charger.. it has WiFi.. for internet  browsing on the couch it is perfect.. for shopping it is nice (Amazon, hello).. 4 stars no charger and no gps..
Reviews.Title: it is very nice..

Reviews.Author: crystal myers
Reviews.Content: I love it....it does everything a tablet would do....and the side is good....it's not to small and not to big....it's perfect.
Reviews.Title: great product!!

Reviews.Author: Theresa C. Morton
Reviews.Content: Great tablet.  Graphics are stunning and I am enjoying getting to know my device.  Have downloading several apps and they are fun and easy to understand.
Reviews.Title: Beautiful and fun....

Reviews.Author: Marion Lane
Reviews.Content: I loved this Kindle.  I am nearly 80 years of age and I appreciate the light behind the reading ---which allows me to read in bed with comfort.  I can also make the letters much larger which helps me read with ease.  It is a blessing.  Marion
Reviews.Title: Excellent for anyone who loves to read.

Reviews.Author: Genell Goodson
Reviews.Content: I was on the fence about buying a Kindle Fire vs an Ipad but I made the right choice! I love it & wouldn't trade it for any other brand tablet out there!
Reviews.Title: Buying this was a great choice!

Reviews.Author: wendy kirby
Reviews.Content: My hubby got this for me for  Christmas ,I love it I have a iPad but it has a shortage in it  this kindle is better  for everything and a great price does the same as a iPad ,
Reviews.Title: 8.9 kindle

Reviews.Author: lsal mom
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle Fire HD 8.9" when Amazon was offering $30 off. It made it only $80 more than the most expensive reader. I had previously owned a Kindle reader with a navigation button. When the button quit working I was unable to use the reader anymore. I began looking for a new Kindle and was unsure which one to purchase. My 10 yr old has a Samsung tablet which I have used on occasion and I find it easy to navigate. I have a Kindle app on my laptop which I used regularly but some books I wanted to check out of the library would only download to a Kindle and not a Kindle app per the publishers guidelines. So when Amazon put the Kindle Fire on sale I decided to get the HD so I could read and also use the internet and play games. I bought the 16 GB with Wi-Fi because I didn't want to pay for a wireless plan and we have Wi-Fi at home. When it arrived I opened it and put it in the case I had purchased and immediately began to use it. It is so easy. The screen is very responsive to finger taps and swipes, maybe even more so than the Samsung. I never have any trouble with my internet connection and pages load very quickly. At 39 I am in what I guess you would call the in between generation. Computers became a household item when I was a teenager and has progressed from there. I didn't cut my teeth on technology but I find it easy to comprehend and this Kindle is very easy for me. My 5, 3, & 2 year old all love to play games on it and read books. My 10 year old wants to play on it too. If you want a Kindle for reading but also spend time online and play games then this is for you. I typed this review on my Kindle Fire, very easy to use keyboard too!
Reviews.Title: Worth every penny!

Reviews.Author: Luci Baker
Reviews.Content: More than met my expectations. Love it.  I use it every day for so many things and it has enhanced my reading experience
Reviews.Title: Very happy with the Kindle HD 8.9!

Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: I love the sound quality, camera, pixles. it is just great and i love it even more then my previous 1st gen kindle!!!
Reviews.Title: good

Reviews.Author: Estella
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my granddaughter and the money was well spent.  It is her constant companion and even encourages her to read books!  So far it has been trouble free.
Reviews.Title: Nice.

Reviews.Author: dancingsky
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle but i was constantly having to recharge my Kindle.  I have contacted Amazon support for the Kindle and it has been determined that I need to return the Kindle for an exchange.  So we will see how the next one works out.
Reviews.Title: Did not meet my expectations

Reviews.Author: JOANNE PERRY
Reviews.Content: So far I love it.  My grandson told me I needed to get one, and even though I had no idea what you did with one, decided to try it.  Its been fun, and flustrating all at the same time, I'm slowly learning my way around it.  When I needed to call Customer Service, they have been extremely friendly, patient and more than helpful.
Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD

Reviews.Author: Barb Wheeler
Reviews.Content: I put off getting a Kindle Fire for a long time, but, not that I have it I'm wondering why I waited so long.  I love the size, the feel and the clarity of the screen.  I have only had it a short time and haven't gotten the full use of everything included on this Kindle.  So far it has been easy to use and all that has been promised.  Hope to have more Kindle time, soon!
Reviews.Title: Great Product!

Reviews.Author: Judy Bohne
Reviews.Content: I have some vision problems that prevent me from doing needlework anymore, which is  a huge disappointment. The Kindle allows me to enlarge the font and have a bright screen so I can read much more easily and not hurt my eyes. I have also enjoyed having Internet access so I can access my emails while I am traveling so the Kindle is very valuable to me.
Reviews.Title: I have really enjoyed having the Kindle.

Reviews.Author: john popp
Reviews.Content: just recieved it. my wife is very impressed. had bad experience with the first off brand tablet and decided to upgrade to a brand you can trust. Possibly we'll be ordering a second in the near future.
Reviews.Title: a company you can depend on for Quality

Reviews.Author: Peter Levin
Reviews.Content: Nothing has gone well in my first few days with my new Kindle Fire HD 8.9. First I had trouble getting it to stay connected to my wifi network when I didn't broadcast the SSID. Amazon tech support helped me fix that with reboots -- which seem to be the recommended generic fix. If it slows down, reboot. If an app doesn't install, reboot. The New Yorker app doesn't work at all -- Amazon cannot connect to the New Yorker to download content. Apparently this is a known problem, but it took Amazon 2 hours on the phone to find this out. I think the app vendors aren't making the Kindle (in all its flavors) high priority targets, thus quality assurance is neglected.Nice display, nice size.AC Adapter should be standard in the box instead of an extra cost option -- it's a necessity.
Reviews.Title: I can see why people pay up for iPads

Reviews.Author: Bert Sutherland
Reviews.Content: Really love my Kindle!  Great buy. Easy to use. Can do everything I want with it. It's a very good deal.
Reviews.Title: Kindle

Reviews.Author: S. Pikula "Fireball"
